content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>The Assistant is here!</h3>

<p>Today we’re excited to unveil the Assistant, a new powerful tool for information consumption that complements Kagi Search. Assistant features direct access to world's best LLMs, grounded in Kagi Search, all in one place and for one price.</p>

<p>Read all about it in <a href="https://blog.kagi.com/announcing-assistant" rel="ugc nofollow">Announcing the Assistant</a> blog post.</p>

<p>This update replaces the Beta version introduced nearly a year ago. It includes many new features, and we are working hard to bring back a few missing ones from the Beta, notably file upload, as soon as possible. You can still access the "old" assistant during the transition period using <a href="https://kagi.com/v1_assistant" rel="ugc nofollow">this link</a>.</p>

<p>We also want to take this opportunity to extend a big thank you to our community, especially to our distinguished members and contributors, for all the feedback and testing that helped us create a better product.</p>



<h3>Growing the Kagi community</h3>

<p>We recently expanded our social presence on the wider web to include Mastodon, Blue Sky and Threads, so be sure to engage with us and follow our journey from the platforms of your choice!</p>

<ul><li><a href="https://mastodon.social/@kagihq" rel="ugc nofollow">Mastodon</a></li>
<li><a href="https://bsky.app/profile/kagi.com" rel="ugc nofollow">Bluesky</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.threads.net/@kagihq" rel="ugc nofollow">Threads</a></li>
<li><a href="https://twitter.com/KagiHQ" rel="ugc nofollow">X</a></li>
<li><a href="https://kagi.com/discord" rel="ugc nofollow">Discord</a></li>
<li><a href="https://kagifeedback.org/" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi Feedback</a></li></ul>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Some restaurant locations have phone numbers, reviews, etc, and some don't <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4432" data-id="4432" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4432</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jtgs" class="UserMention">@jtgs</a></li>
<li>Billing page is stringifying binary icon files for Orion buttons <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4719" data-id="4719" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4719</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li>
<li>New Assistant - Reproducable Connection Error <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4653" data-id="4653" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4653</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/silvenga" class="UserMention">@silvenga</a> </li>
<li>Assistant’s voice input doesn’t properly close/release microphone on safari <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4663" data-id="4663" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4663</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jcbohin" class="UserMention">@jcbohin</a> </li>
<li>Make the chat window size adjustable.  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4051" data-id="4051" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4051</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tombert" class="UserMention">@tombert</a></li></ul>


<h3>Assistant</h3>

<ul><li>We added several helpful keyboard shortcuts. Access the help modal with <code>cmd + .</code> on a Mac or <code>Ctrl + .</code> on Windows and Linux</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-09-03/1725392352-766230-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li>You can now change models and internet options when editing messages</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-09-03/1725391905-26005-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li>Introduces a redesigned threads bar and a new model + internet access configuration menu</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-09-03/1725391502-428930-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>


</content>

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h2>Announcement</h2>

<p>We’ve spent months thinking about the Google antitrust case and its implications to the search landscape.</p>

<p>Read our response in an opinion piece titled <a href="https://blog.kagi.com/dawn-new-era-search" rel="ugc nofollow">Dawn of a new era in Search: Balancing innovation, competition, and public good</a>.</p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Highlighting countries/cities in Kagi Maps like Google Maps does it <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4408" data-id="4408" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4408</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Grooty" class="UserMention">@Grooty</a></li>
<li>Time filter reset with search results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4421" data-id="4421" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4421</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/GravityMan" class="UserMention">@GravityMan</a></li>
<li>Search result scroll broken Firefox mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4588" data-id="4588" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4588</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mfashby" class="UserMention">@mfashby</a></li>
<li>Show assistant search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4645" data-id="4645" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4645</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a> </li>
<li>Universal summarizer seems to have some difficulty with very large pdf's <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4360" data-id="4360" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4360</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/snellejelle99" class="UserMention">@snellejelle99</a></li>
<li>Summarizer does not summarize text if the first word has a colon. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4467" data-id="4467" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4467</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/__" class="UserMention">@__</a></li>
<li>The prompt "Hunter S Thompson" reliably fails with Kagi Assistant Beta <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4657" data-id="4657" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4657</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/roach" class="UserMention">@roach</a></li>
<li>Several other Assistant-related improvements and bug fixes</li></ul>

<p><strong>Assistant</strong></p>

<ul><li>Threads are now grouped by date and automatically named based on your prompt.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-08-29/1724952842-200440-image.png" title="" alt=""></li>
<li>Clicking on the Kagi icon will open the search results the Assistant used to answer your prompt, allowing you to review the exact information.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-08-29/1724951661-273739-image.png" title="" alt=""></li></ul>

</content>

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Announcement</h3>
<p>We're happy to <strong>release a preview version of the new Kagi Assistant to all Ultimate subscribers today!</strong> (if you want to get a taste before official launch, you can temporarily upgrade to Ultimate plan and go back if you want - we pro-rate all payments so not a cent is lost). This update introduces a completely revamped experience along with several eagerly awaited features, including:</p>
<ul><li>Access the best LLM models using Kagi Search to solve your tasks</li>
<li>The ability to save Assistant threads</li>
<li>More powerful custom assistants</li>
<li>Control over the Assistant's internet access</li>
<li>Customizable system instructions for the Assistant</li>
<li>... and many other enhancements<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-08-22/1724352375-659450-image.png" title="" alt=""><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-08-22/1724353086-68324-image.png" title="" alt=""><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-08-22/1724356845-236777-image.png" title="" alt=""></li></ul>


<h5>How to access it</h5>
<p>Kagi Assistant is still in Beta and during this phase, both the current and new versions of the Assistant will be available. The old Assistant remains unchanged, while the new Assistant can be accessed through the link in the top right corner (see below).<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-08-22/1724349050-848437-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>


<h5>What's Next</h5>
<p>We're actively working on the Kagi Assistant, releasing changes bi-weekly. Some of the upcoming enhancements include:</p>
<ul><li>A further refined UI/UX, with a particular focus on the mobile experience</li>
<li>Additional features and capabilities (stay tuned!)</li></ul>

<h5>Your Feedback Matters</h5>
<p>We're committed to making the Kagi Assistant the best it can be. Share your thoughts and suggestions at <a href="https://kagifeedback.org" rel="ugc nofollow">kagifeedback.org</a> – we take all feedback seriously.</p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Several Kagi Maps updates, including
 <ul><li>Added contact info (phone/website) to results dropdown</li>
 <li>Added global coverage of mountain peaks with elevation data</li>
 <li>Added support for directions and navigation to kagi-basemap</li></ul></li>
<li>Accessibility improvements, @"Minionslayer"  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2923" data-id="2923" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2923</span></a>: added checked/unchecked labels for toggle switches in settings, and made result favicon and url accessible by screen readers</li>
<li>Kagi Maps street search opens entirely wrong location <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3522" data-id="3522" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3522</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a> </li>
<li>Non-English characters are stripped from maps search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4507" data-id="4507" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4507</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/carl" class="UserMention">@carl</a></li>
<li>Searching for "half glans verf", i.e. semi-gloss paint in dutch, shows inappropriate wiki <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2853" data-id="2853" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2853</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/glossydick" class="UserMention">@glossydick</a></li>
<li>Not all shortcuts work on the Kagi front page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4514" data-id="4514" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4514</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jemuelb" class="UserMention">@jemuelb</a></li>
<li>Fast search not working in existing tab (Kagi for Safari, iOS 18 Beta) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4511" data-id="4511" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4511</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/gimmick-scissor" class="UserMention">@gimmick-scissor</a></li>
<li>Icons misaligned on image search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4394" data-id="4394" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4394</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a></li>
<li>Universal summarizer is no longer closed-context(?) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4468" data-id="4468" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4468</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tempname1024" class="UserMention">@tempname1024</a></li>
<li>Website ranking adjustments doesn't work for kids accounts <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3626" data-id="3626" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3626</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/DanielDrucker" class="UserMention">@DanielDrucker</a></li>
<li>Blocking pinterest.com still shows images from its subdomains <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4531" data-id="4531" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4531</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a></li>
<li>"Carlisle, MA" goes weird in Maps <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4236" data-id="4236" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4236</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jducoeur" class="UserMention">@jducoeur</a></li>
<li>Search Showing Returning Hidden JSON Content <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4527" data-id="4527" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4527</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/silvenga" class="UserMention">@silvenga</a></li>
<li>GitHub search result previews/snippets display a login notice <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4488" data-id="4488" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4488</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/dslatkin" class="UserMention">@dslatkin</a></li>
<li>Drag and drop reverse image search doesn't work. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4419" data-id="4419" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4419</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sleepysnooze" class="UserMention">@sleepysnooze</a></li>
<li>Results from github pages like *.github.io are showing separatly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3385" data-id="3385" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3385</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Browsing6853" class="UserMention">@Browsing6853</a></li>
<li>Some Wikipedia links in the widget cannot be clicked <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4508" data-id="4508" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4508</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ntt" class="UserMention">@ntt</a></li>
<li>QR code login not working <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4523" data-id="4523" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4523</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mattfusf" class="UserMention">@mattfusf</a></li>
<li>Custom CSS page returns 404 <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4571" data-id="4571" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4571</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a></li>
<li>The search for adding a shortcut is case sensitive. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4328" data-id="4328" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4328</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ntt" class="UserMention">@ntt</a> </li>
<li>"Remove results from this site" returns results from the chosen site <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4457" data-id="4457" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4457</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/RedEd" class="UserMention">@RedEd</a></li>
<li>Searchbox in country of origin selector does not work while a lens is on <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/454" data-id="454" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#454</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/GOATS2K" class="UserMention">@GOATS2K</a></li>
<li>".land_tooltip_message" needs <code>z-index: 3;</code> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4539" data-id="4539" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4539</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nicoty" class="UserMention">@nicoty</a></li>
<li>Font issue <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4463" data-id="4463" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4463</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Powerpill" class="UserMention">@Powerpill</a></li>
<li>Assistant options aren't properly alligned on desktop <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4544" data-id="4544" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4544</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/laiz" class="UserMention">@laiz</a></li>
<li>Research expert AI interpreting an uploaded JPG file as text <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4379" data-id="4379" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4379</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/CyberMaverick" class="UserMention">@CyberMaverick</a></li></ul>

<h5>Tickets solved with the new version of the Kagi Assistant</h5>
 <ul><li>Lenses are not activated for research <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3317" data-id="3317" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3317</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tkataja" class="UserMention">@tkataja</a> </li>
 <li>When switching chat models, inform the user of the switch <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2739" data-id="2739" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2739</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tiltowait" class="UserMention">@tiltowait</a> </li>
 <li>Sticky assistant's follow-up input box to the bottom of the screen <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4319" data-id="4319" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4319</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a> </li>
 <li>Research Assistant Sources Tooltip Overflows <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4450" data-id="4450" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4450</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/silvenga" class="UserMention">@silvenga</a> </li>
 <li>Assistant switch truncates longer prompts <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4274" data-id="4274" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4274</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a></li>
 <li>Unnecessary scroll bar in assistant message <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4481" data-id="4481" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4481</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/oxlvlnle" class="UserMention">@oxlvlnle</a> </li>
 <li>Edit prompts in AI chat <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4503" data-id="4503" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4503</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/fxgn" class="UserMention">@fxgn</a></li>
 <li>Assistant query box does not expand on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4213" data-id="4213" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4213</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stevek" class="UserMention">@stevek</a></li>
 <li>Assistant's code output is often hard to follow due to the limited width of the assistant's output <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4304" data-id="4304" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4304</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/MrMcyeet" class="UserMention">@MrMcyeet</a> </li>
 <li>Changing assistant mode with too long of a prompt <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4273" data-id="4273" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4273</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a> </li>
 <li>AI Assistant Tooltips - Hard to Interact <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4081" data-id="4081" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4081</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/silvenga" class="UserMention">@silvenga</a> </li>
 <li>Chat assistant not resumable after error <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3898" data-id="3898" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3898</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/user83929212" class="UserMention">@user83929212</a> </li>
 <li>Expert refers to sources/documents, but doesn't list them. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3668" data-id="3668" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3668</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Siebjee" class="UserMention">@Siebjee</a></li>
 <li>Assistant code formatting <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3367" data-id="3367" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3367</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a> </li>
 <li>Code block inside list not rendered properly in Assistants <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3238" data-id="3238" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3238</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/gladiator2339" class="UserMention">@gladiator2339</a></li>
 <li>Reloading research mode asks and answers the question again in the same thread <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3170" data-id="3170" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3170</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a></li>
 <li>Assistant does not allow continuation of chat after 'error' <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3144" data-id="3144" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3144</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/HeheNaicha" class="UserMention">@HeheNaicha</a></li>
 <li>Expert Assistant Response Quality <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3102" data-id="3102" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3102</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Reroute5183" class="UserMention">@Reroute5183</a></li>
 <li>Very few  or no results for many queries. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2755" data-id="2755" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2755</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Johnbyurn" class="UserMention">@Johnbyurn</a></li>
 <li>Inconsistent spacing between bullet points on Assistant responses <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2718" data-id="2718" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2718</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a> </li>
 <li>Copy code button is not shown for gpt4 / is not shown randomly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2660" data-id="2660" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2660</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/0xdeafbeef" class="UserMention">@0xdeafbeef</a></li>
 <li>Assistant citation quotation popups contain snippets that are unnecessarily long <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2624" data-id="2624" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2624</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a> </li>
 <li>Assistant refuses to conduct web searches in response to followup questions (Research+Expert) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2359" data-id="2359" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2359</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nissa" class="UserMention">@nissa</a></li>
 <li>Token limit instead of character limit <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4275" data-id="4275" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4275</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a></li>
 <li>Custom assistant: character count <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3497" data-id="3497" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3497</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/JamesT" class="UserMention">@JamesT</a> </li>
 <li>Show urls the assistant sees on the side or in some menu  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3273" data-id="3273" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3273</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a> </li>
 <li>Merge fast and expert into one mode.  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3075" data-id="3075" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3075</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mazil" class="UserMention">@mazil</a></li>
 <li>Inline LaTeX rendering for Assistant responses <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2581" data-id="2581" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2581</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a> </li>
 <li>Make AI response prompt wider. Code is in a very narrow box. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2588" data-id="2588" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2588</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jve" class="UserMention">@jve</a></li>
 <li>Utilize kagi assistant to get up to date news <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2372" data-id="2372" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2372</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Dumb" class="UserMention">@Dumb</a> </li>
 <li>Delete (or edit) Assistant chat messages <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2338" data-id="2338" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2338</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Greg" class="UserMention">@Greg</a></li>
 <li>Save AI chats for future continuation <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2272" data-id="2272" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2272</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Skitzi" class="UserMention">@Skitzi</a></li></ul></content>

entries.description:
Announcement

We're happy to release a preview version of the new Kagi Assistant to all Ultimate subscribers today! (if you want to get a taste before official launch, you can temporarily upgrade to Ultimate plan and go back if you want - we pro-rate all payments so not a cent is lost). This update introduces a completely revamped experience along with several eagerly awaited features, including:

  • Access the best LLM models using Kagi Search to solve your tasks
  • The ability to save Assistant threads
  • More powerful custom assistants
  • Control over the Assistant's internet access
  • Customizable system instructions for the Assistant
  • ... and many other enhancements


How to access it

Kagi Assistant is still in Beta and during this phase, both the current and new versions of the Assistant will be available. The old Assistant remains unchanged, while the new Assistant can be accessed through the link in the top right corner (see below).

What's Next

We're actively working on the Kagi Assistant, releasing changes bi-weekly. Some of the upcoming enhancements include:

  • A further refined UI/UX, with a particular focus on the mobile experience
  • Additional features and capabilities (stay tuned!)
Your Feedback Matters

We're committed to making the Kagi Assistant the best it can be. Share your thoughts and suggestions at kagifeedback.org – we take all feedback seriously.

Improvements and bug fixes

  • Several Kagi Maps updates, including
    • Added contact info (phone/website) to results dropdown
    • Added global coverage of
entries.title: August 22, 2024 - Preview Release of the new Kagi Assistant for Ultimate Subscribers

entries.author: Luis

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Kagi LLM Benchmarking Project</h3>

<p>Introducing the <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/ai/llm-benchmark.html" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi LLM Benchmarking Project</a>, which evaluates major large language models (LLMs) on their reasoning, coding, and instruction following capabilities on an unpolluted benchmark relevant to using LLMs in the context of search.</p>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-07-30/1722351656-207064-screenshot-2024-07-30-at-80052-am.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Fixes to session synchronization between devices</li>
<li>Fixed a performance regression on initial search page load</li>
<li>Adjust the redirect for "no results found" when searching with Lenses <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4471" data-id="4471" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4471</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/snuser" class="UserMention">@snuser</a></li>
<li>Comboboxes' search bar is overlapped by provided options below <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4472" data-id="4472" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4472</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/snuser" class="UserMention">@snuser</a></li>
<li>!gi redirection broken from image result pages <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4486" data-id="4486" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4486</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tuesday" class="UserMention">@tuesday</a></li>
<li>Non ascii characters breaks from image search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4434" data-id="4434" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4434</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/etra0" class="UserMention">@etra0</a></li>
<li>Image search filters not working <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4424" data-id="4424" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4424</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/-mbs-" class="UserMention">@-mbs-</a></li>
<li>Ask questions about the page issue is still not resolved <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4519" data-id="4519" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4519</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ntt" class="UserMention">@ntt</a> </li>
<li>Search control popup is trapped inside when word definition box is present <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4482" data-id="4482" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4482</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a> </li>
<li>Should be able to click on a Map item and see more about it <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4055" data-id="4055" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4055</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jducoeur" class="UserMention">@jducoeur</a> </li>
<li>Some of the text for the widgets are not translatable <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4183" data-id="4183" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4183</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Grooty" class="UserMention">@Grooty</a> </li>
<li>When using upload feature it no longer responds to follow up questions <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4447" data-id="4447" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4447</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cakeboss" class="UserMention">@cakeboss</a></li>
<li>Upgraded Mistal Small to Mistral Nemo model in Assistant chat mode</li></ul></content>

entries.description:
Kagi LLM Benchmarking Project

Introducing the Kagi LLM Benchmarking Project, which evaluates major large language models (LLMs) on their reasoning, coding, and instruction following capabilities on an unpolluted benchmark relevant to using LLMs in the context of search.

Improvements and bug fixes

  • Fixes to session synchronization between devices
  • Fixed a performance regression on initial search page load
  • Adjust the redirect for "no results found" when searching with Lenses #4471 @snuser
  • Comboboxes' search bar is overlapped by provided options below #4472 @snuser
  • !gi redirection broken from image result pages #4486 @tuesday
  • Non ascii characters breaks from image search #4434 @etra0
  • Image search filters not working #4424 @-mbs-
  • Ask questions about the page issue is still not resolved #4519 @ntt
  • Search control popup is trapped inside when word definition box is present #4482 @sefidel
  • Should be able to click on a Map item and see more about it #4055 @jducoeur
  • Some of the text for the widgets are not translatable #4183 @Grooty
  • When using upload feature it no longer responds to follow up questions #4447 @cakeboss
  • Upgraded Mistal Small to Mistral Nemo model in Assistant chat mode

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Announcements</h3>
<p>In preparation for the next steps for Kagi, we're launching a new Discord server where we will consolidate both of our communities for Search, Browser, and all future Kagi products.</p>

<p>Join here: <a href="https://kagi.com/discord" rel="ugc nofollow">https://kagi.com/discord</a></p>

<p>We welcome everyone, whether you are a long standing supporter or just learning about Kagi, to come hang out with us and get excited about what's coming next.</p>

<p>The existing servers will be sunset over the course of the following week.</p>

<p>See you there!</p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>We've introduced a <strong>Search Builder</strong>, a user-friendly tool for creating advanced search queries. It's accessible via the filters bar.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-07-19/1721396603-467044-image.png" title="" alt=""></li>
<li>Image Search filters do not update results after initial search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4405" data-id="4405" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4405</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Dannn404" class="UserMention">@Dannn404</a></li>
<li>Video search filters not working <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4407" data-id="4407" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4407</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ntt" class="UserMention">@ntt</a></li>
<li>Very small close button on control panel <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4395" data-id="4395" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4395</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a> </li>
<li>Auto focus the 6-digit input on 2fa page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4253" data-id="4253" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4253</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/kagiiscool22" class="UserMention">@kagiiscool22</a></li>
<li>Hovering over sub-results causes the alignment to change <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4404" data-id="4404" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4404</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stylus" class="UserMention">@stylus</a></li>
<li>Discuss fuction isn't working properly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4431" data-id="4431" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4431</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sleepysnooze" class="UserMention">@sleepysnooze</a> </li>
<li>Ask questions about the page ignores the page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4402" data-id="4402" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4402</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ntt" class="UserMention">@ntt</a></li>
<li>Landing page annoying bugs in html version <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4006" data-id="4006" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4006</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ak42" class="UserMention">@ak42</a></li>
<li>Far-away locations don't resolve when clicked on <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3463" data-id="3463" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3463</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/PatrickPoitras" class="UserMention">@PatrickPoitras</a></li>
<li>Map search goes to the wrong spot when given an ambiguous query <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3404" data-id="3404" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3404</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tinkling6961" class="UserMention">@tinkling6961</a></li></ul></content>

In preparation for the next steps for Kagi, we're launching a new Discord server where we will consolidate both of our communities for Search, Browser, and all future Kagi products.

Join here: https://kagi.com/discord

We welcome everyone, whether you are a long standing supporter or just learning about Kagi, to come hang out with us and get excited about what's coming next.

The existing servers will be sunset over the course of the following week.

See you there!

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>We have simplified the process for creating new search Lenses. These help you narrow your search to specific topics or domains. Visit our <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/features/lenses.html" rel="ugc nofollow">help page</a> to learn more about how to use them!</li>
<li>When you provide a GitHub Issue link to the Universal Summarizer, it will now summarize the content in a structured format.  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4219" data-id="4219" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4219</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/w3irdrobot" class="UserMention">@w3irdrobot</a></li>
<li>Password required to see Kagi plans available <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4226" data-id="4226" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4226</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stom" class="UserMention">@stom</a></li>
<li>Custom CSS toggle disappears on reload <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4363" data-id="4363" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4363</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/swap" class="UserMention">@swap</a> </li>
<li>Map search one specific place instead of category <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4266" data-id="4266" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4266</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nativetype" class="UserMention">@nativetype</a></li>
<li>Weather widget shows 180% precipitation <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4365" data-id="4365" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4365</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/leftium" class="UserMention">@leftium</a></li>
<li>Settings headers font bug <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4357" data-id="4357" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4357</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Albi" class="UserMention">@Albi</a></li>
<li>Finding all the settings on mobile has become complicated <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4367" data-id="4367" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4367</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/chris_20017" class="UserMention">@chris_20017</a></li>
<li>Provide scores for reviews of books and movies <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1912" data-id="1912" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1912</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rudyfink" class="UserMention">@rudyfink</a></li>
<li>Summaries of reddit posts are limited to the OP and do not include responses (which would be useful in a summary) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3677" data-id="3677" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3677</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bois" class="UserMention">@bois</a> </li>
<li>Mobile UI for redirect rules setting is broken when rules are long <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4263" data-id="4263" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4263</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/i_forgor_my_password" class="UserMention">@i_forgor_my_password</a></li>
<li>Clicking arrow up on opened lenses menu arrow does not collapse it <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4268" data-id="4268" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4268</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a></li>
<li>Selecting a lense using keyboard in the search suggestions doesn't enable it <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4212" data-id="4212" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4212</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Ishan512" class="UserMention">@Ishan512</a></li>
<li>Preload full res images on image search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4249" data-id="4249" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4249</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nathants" class="UserMention">@nathants</a></li>
<li>Firefox extension keeps logging me out <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4327" data-id="4327" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4327</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Fracture" class="UserMention">@Fracture</a> </li>
<li>Right slash <code>/</code> does not  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4372" data-id="4372" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4372</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bugman" class="UserMention">@bugman</a></li>
<li>Universal Summarizer Consistently Doesn't Accurately Handle "Listicle" Videos <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4340" data-id="4340" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4340</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/MollyInanna" class="UserMention">@MollyInanna</a></li>
<li>Link preview messe up in AI results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4368" data-id="4368" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4368</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Fracture" class="UserMention">@Fracture</a></li>
<li>Add codestral to AI assistant  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4339" data-id="4339" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4339</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/terry" class="UserMention">@terry</a> </li>
<li>"Sorry, a problem occurred" -- stability of AI became worse in the last months <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4248" data-id="4248" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4248</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tastyminerals" class="UserMention">@tastyminerals</a></li>
<li>Expert mode bad quality <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3659" data-id="3659" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3659</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mazil" class="UserMention">@mazil</a></li></ul></content>

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h4>Improvements and bug fixes</h4>
<ul><li>We've launched an updated version of our Kagi for Safari app (v 2.2.6) that makes your search experience faster and smoother. <br>
Please note, unfortunately you will need to follow the setup steps again. For guidance, refer to the instructions within the app. If you encounter any issues don't hesitate to contact us through <a href="mailto:support@kagi.com">support@kagi.com</a> or our <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/" rel="ugc nofollow">feedback forum</a>.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-06-25/1719339938-126356-img-ff443a8da9cc-1.jpg" title="" alt=""></li>
<li>We've also updated our Control Centre to provide easier access to our tools,<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-06-25/1719341919-875624-image.png" title="" alt=""></li>
<li>Claude 3.5 Sonnet is now available in Assistant (chat-mode) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4312" data-id="4312" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4312</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/eikaramba" class="UserMention">@eikaramba</a></li>
<li>Created a new subpage to organise all AI-related search settings</li>
<li>Kagi maps settings panel in dark mode is not readable <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4269" data-id="4269" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4269</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a></li>
<li>Improved listicle handling in search results (<a href="https://x.com/doctorow" rel="ugc nofollow">@doctorow</a>)</li>
<li>Ability to swipe left for next image in image search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4145" data-id="4145" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4145</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/KagiLagi" class="UserMention">@KagiLagi</a> </li>
<li>UI: Increase Button Size for Website Detail on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4244" data-id="4244" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4244</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/JonahFintz" class="UserMention">@JonahFintz</a></li>
<li>Maps display broken in firefox <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3799" data-id="3799" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3799</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/the21st" class="UserMention">@the21st</a></li>
<li>Weird ‘more’ dropdown on News tab <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4224" data-id="4224" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4224</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a> </li>
<li>State boundary could be more visible on the new Kagi basemap <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4267" data-id="4267" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4267</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/chbug" class="UserMention">@chbug</a></li>
<li>Discuss UI on iPhone is super horsey  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4007" data-id="4007" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4007</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Bradh" class="UserMention">@Bradh</a></li>
<li>Wild hallucinations <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4199" data-id="4199" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4199</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/RHvdG" class="UserMention">@RHvdG</a></li>
<li>Expert Research Not Taking Question but ChatGPT Does <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4300" data-id="4300" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4300</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/OldMan973471" class="UserMention">@OldMan973471</a> </li>
<li>Universal summarizer unable to extract source when using news.ycombinator.com <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4292" data-id="4292" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4292</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jackjackk" class="UserMention">@jackjackk</a></li></ul></content>

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html">
<h3>Features</h3>
<h4>Introducing the Kagi and OpenStreetMap Basemaps</h4>
<p>We have updated our maps page to include two new basemap options: the Kagi Basemap and the OpenStreetMap (OSM) Basemap. You can switch between these options via the top left corner of the maps search bar.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-06-12/1718217498-508478-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<p>The search results remain consistent across both basemaps; however, we are planning to introduce additional features and customisation options soon! <br>
The Kagi basemap focus on greater detail, readability, and map-comprehension, using 3d landmarks, trees, shadows and improved labeling. The OSM basemap will be optimized for speed and a lightweight map search experience. <br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-06-12/1718217842-488473-image.png" title="" alt=""><br>
Other improvements to Maps:</p>
<ul><li>Kagi Maps Dark Mode <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3943" data-id="3943" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3943</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/alexjsteffen" class="UserMention">@alexjsteffen</a></li>
<li>Display phone number on Business Map Listing <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4151" data-id="4151" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4151</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/champs777" class="UserMention">@champs777</a></li></ul>

<h4>Enhanced domain blocking</h4>
<p>We've contributed to the open-source <a href="https://kagi.com/search?q=ublacklist&amp;personalized=0&amp;r=no_region&amp;sh=3RUD5wfB2JMtpLvfY5Wc8A" rel="ugc nofollow">uBlacklist extension</a>, adding support for Kagi Search. For users looking for more complex site blocking patterns or to take advantage of existing repositories of blocking rules, this one's for you! This update improves user experience and underscores our commitment to community-driven development (suggested in <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/262" data-id="262" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#262</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/pessoa" class="UserMention">@pessoa</a>)</p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Links to Google and Apple Maps in the Maps view are not escaped/encoded correctly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3832" data-id="3832" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3832</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jbattermann" class="UserMention">@jbattermann</a></li>
<li>Incorrect city summary on Maps <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4069" data-id="4069" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4069</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/unruffled5088" class="UserMention">@unruffled5088</a></li>
<li>Order by Time doesn’t work <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1176" data-id="1176" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1176</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/danny" class="UserMention">@danny</a></li>
<li>Time textual display does not update <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4000" data-id="4000" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4000</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/adamaveray" class="UserMention">@adamaveray</a></li>
<li>Duplicate search result for query "fish-async-prompt" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4227" data-id="4227" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4227</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sorrel" class="UserMention">@sorrel</a> </li>
<li>Keyboard scrolling opens each Quick Peek item <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4179" data-id="4179" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4179</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mIX" class="UserMention">@mIX</a></li>
<li>Weather widget doesn't show german umlauts properly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4003" data-id="4003" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4003</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/slobodan" class="UserMention">@slobodan</a> </li>
<li>Option to remove horizontal lines <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4247" data-id="4247" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4247</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nzain" class="UserMention">@nzain</a> </li>
<li>Duplicate Personalized Result don't get overwritten. Error with conflicting prioities. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3970" data-id="3970" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3970</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/LucasOe" class="UserMention">@LucasOe</a></li>
<li>Make Images, Videos, ect headers clickable <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4169" data-id="4169" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4169</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/dima" class="UserMention">@dima</a> </li>
<li>Image modal closes browser fullscreen mode when closing with esc <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4157" data-id="4157" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4157</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/hrefhref" class="UserMention">@hrefhref</a></li>
<li>Enabling a lens should check the enabled button immediately <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3963" data-id="3963" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3963</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/DomW" class="UserMention">@DomW</a></li>
<li>Allow date range when searching videos <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3630" data-id="3630" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3630</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Thibaultmol" class="UserMention">@Thibaultmol</a></li>

entries.description:
Features

Introducing the Kagi and OpenStreetMap Basemaps

We have updated our maps page to include two new basemap options: the Kagi Basemap and the OpenStreetMap (OSM) Basemap. You can switch between these options via the top left corner of the maps search bar.

The search results remain consistent across both basemaps; however, we are planning to introduce additional features and customisation options soon!
The Kagi basemap focus on greater detail, readability, and map-comprehension, using 3d landmarks, trees, shadows and improved labeling. The OSM basemap will be optimized for speed and a lightweight map search experience.

Other improvements to Maps:

  • Kagi Maps Dark Mode #3943 @alexjsteffen
  • Display phone number on Business Map Listing #4151 @champs777

Enhanced domain blocking

We've contributed to the open-source uBlacklist extension, adding support for Kagi Search. For users looking for more complex site blocking patterns or to take advantage of existing repositories of blocking rules, this one's for you! This update improves user experience and underscores our commitment to community-driven development (suggested in #262 @pessoa)

Improvements and bug fixes

  • Links to Google and Apple Maps in the Maps view are not escaped/encoded correctly #3832 @jbattermann
  • Incorrect city summary on Maps #4069 @unruffled5088
  • Order by Time doesn’t work #1176 @danny
  • Time textual display does not

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Improvements</h3>

<h4>Search latency &amp; typo correction</h4>
<p>This release successfully reduces search latency for approximately 20% of queries, while also enhancing our search suggestions and typo correction capabilities. Enjoy the improved performance and happy searching!</p>

<h4>Kagi Search for Safari update</h4>

<p>If you are using Safari with iOS developer beta (17.5), <a href="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/kagi-for-safari/id1622835804" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi Search for Safari</a> extension may have stopped working due to a <a href="https://forums.developer.apple.com/forums/thread/750330" rel="ugc nofollow">bug</a> introduced in this iOS release last week. We have released a <a href="https://testflight.apple.com/join/nx6Gvf4h" rel="ugc nofollow">TestFlight version</a> of the new version that should work. We are planning to release it to app store as soon as we get positive verification from users. It may help long term if you took a second and <a href="https://www.apple.com/feedback/safari.html" rel="ugc nofollow">sent feedback to Apple</a> to consider including Kagi as a search engine choice in Safari. Thank you 🙏</p>

  <p> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4041" data-id="4041" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4041</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Database" class="UserMention">@Database</a></p>

<p>Other improvements and bug fixes:</p>
<ul><li>Cutoff menus in search if query box is empty <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4018" data-id="4018" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4018</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/TheSingular" class="UserMention">@TheSingular</a></li>
<li>Console error when clicking feedback button <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4074" data-id="4074" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4074</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/azdanov" class="UserMention">@azdanov</a></li>
<li>Minor XSS in family name (missing html escape) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4084" data-id="4084" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4084</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/davgi" class="UserMention">@davgi</a> </li>
<li>"Abort" button on a user ultimate upgrade goes to 404 page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4032" data-id="4032" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4032</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Iselian" class="UserMention">@Iselian</a></li>
<li>Quick answers blank <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4035" data-id="4035" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4035</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/MyaStark" class="UserMention">@MyaStark</a></li>
<li>Universal Summarizer: PDF from Swedish accident authority fails <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4073" data-id="4073" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4073</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mon" class="UserMention">@mon</a></li>
<li>Summarizer issue with URL <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4068" data-id="4068" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4068</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Rudotel" class="UserMention">@Rudotel</a></li>
<li>Summarizer does not behave as intended with recipies (linked to <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3937" data-id="3937" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3937</span></a> and latest release notes) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4066" data-id="4066" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4066</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/crentist" class="UserMention">@crentist</a></li>
<li>Custom Assistant Doesn't Save Unless Response Box Filled Out <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4004" data-id="4004" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4004</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/OldMan973471" class="UserMention">@OldMan973471</a></li>
<li>New assistant icon is off-centred  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3994" data-id="3994" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3994</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a> </li>
<li>Custom AI settings disappeared <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4038" data-id="4038" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4038</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nichu42" class="UserMention">@nichu42</a></li>
<li>With many images the assistant is "unable to extract the source" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4053" data-id="4053" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4053</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/RHvdG" class="UserMention">@RHvdG</a> </li>
<li>A lengthy chat with AI gets stuck in "Processing" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4040" data-id="4040" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4040</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cvzakharchenko" class="UserMention">@cvzakharchenko</a></li>
<li>Replace GPT-4V API with the cheaper and better GPT-4o API <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/4025" data-id="4025" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#4025</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mullinggroove" class="UserMention">@mullinggroove</a></li></ul></content>

Improvements

Search latency & typo correction

This release successfully reduces search latency for approximately 20% of queries, while also enhancing our search suggestions and typo correction capabilities. Enjoy the improved performance and happy searching!

Kagi Search for Safari update

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h2>Features</h2>
<h3>GPT-4o integrated in Kagi Assistant</h3>

<p>We've benchmarked OpenAI's new flagship model <a href="https://openai.com/index/hello-gpt-4o/" rel="ugc nofollow">GPT-4o</a>, released yesterday, and its performance on our internal independent tests (<a href="https://github.com/kagisearch/pyllms?tab=readme-ov-file#model-benchmarks" rel="ugc nofollow">PyLLMs</a> and reasoning on <a href="https://github.com/kagisearch/llm-chess-puzzles?tab=readme-ov-file#results" rel="ugc nofollow">Chess puzzles</a>) as well as <a href="http://nian.llmonpy.ai" rel="ugc nofollow">external</a> is impressive. As a result, GPT-4o has now been used across various features in Assistant:</p>

<ul><li><p>Default model for <a href="https://kagi.com/assistant?mode=7&amp;sub_mode=2" rel="ugc nofollow">Research Expert mode</a> and <a href="https://kagi.com/assistant?mode=5&amp;sub_mode=NaN" rel="ugc nofollow">Code assistant</a></p></li>

<li><p>Used for interpreting and working with uploaded files, including images</p></li>

<li><p>Available through <a href="https://kagi.com/assistant?mode=4&amp;sub_mode=15" rel="ugc nofollow">Chat Assistant</a></p></li></ul>

<p><em>Note: Kagi Assistant is available as open beta for Ultimate plan members</em></p>

<h3>Recipe extraction/summarizer</h3>

<p>Kagi Universal Summarizer now automatically identifies when you are summarizing a recipe and conveniently <a href="https://kagi.com/summarizer/index.html?target_language=&amp;summary=takeaway&amp;url=https://www.simplyrecipes.com/recipes/spaghetti_alla_carbonara/" rel="ugc nofollow">displays both the ingredients and the cooking steps</a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3937" data-id="3937" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3937</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/leopoldarrestrom" class="UserMention">@leopoldarrestrom</a></p>

<p>You can use Kagi Summarizer as a standalone <a href="https://kagi.com/summarizer" rel="ugc nofollow">Web app</a>, through <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/getting-started/setting-default.html#browser_extension" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi Search Extension</a> in your browser or <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/ai/summarize-page.html" rel="ugc nofollow">directly in search results</a>.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-05-14/1715718631-691299-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>



<h5>Additional notes for Family / Team account members</h5>
<p>When setting up a Family or Team account, you now have the ability to add names for each member. This feature is particularly useful for managing team members who use email aliases <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2695" data-id="2695" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2695</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Alligator" class="UserMention">@Alligator</a><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-05-14/1715716013-97931-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Wikipedia card links do not work with smaller browser windows <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3469" data-id="3469" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3469</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/yeri" class="UserMention">@yeri</a></li>
<li>Time in Portugal throws a NaN error <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3986" data-id="3986" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3986</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bleveck" class="UserMention">@bleveck</a></li>
<li>Wikipedia widget does not appear, even though there are relevant Wikipedia articles as search results. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/394" data-id="394" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#394</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/iiv" class="UserMention">@iiv</a></li>
<li>Sorry, I couldn't summarize these results. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3992" data-id="3992" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3992</span></a> @sjdonadoo</li>

(Invalid Input)" on normal queries <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3990" data-id="3990" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3990</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li></ul></content>

entries.description:
Features

GPT-4o integrated in Kagi Assistant

We've benchmarked OpenAI's new flagship model GPT-4o, released yesterday, and its performance on our internal independent tests (PyLLMs and reasoning on Chess puzzles) as well as external is impressive. As a result, GPT-4o has now been used across various features in Assistant:

  • Default model for Research Expert mode and Code assistant

  • Used for interpreting and working with uploaded files, including images

  • Available through Chat Assistant

Note: Kagi Assistant is available as open beta for Ultimate plan members

Recipe extraction/summarizer

Kagi Universal Summarizer now automatically identifies when you are summarizing a recipe and conveniently displays both the ingredients and the cooking steps #3937 @leopoldarrestrom

You can use Kagi Summarizer as a standalone Web app, through Kagi Search Extension in your browser or directly in search results.

Additional notes for Family / Team account members

When setting up a Family or Team account, you now have the ability to add names for each member. This feature is particularly useful for managing team members who use email aliases #2695 @Alligator

Improvements and bug fixes

  • Wikipedia card links do not work with smaller browser windows #3469 @yeri
  • Time in Portugal throws a NaN error

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Announcements</h3>

<h4>We are hiring!</h4>
<p>As we continue our journey, we're hiring across various teams. Visit our <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/company/hiring-kagi.html" rel="ugc nofollow">jobs page</a> for more details and reach out via email if you're interested in joining!</p>


<h4>Advanced Account Security</h4>

<p>On select pages, Kagi will now ask you to confirm with your password or 2FA code (if <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/privacy/two-factor-authentication.html" rel="ugc nofollow">configured</a>) where sensitive actions or information may be present. This primarily applies to billing-related areas, such as accessing your invoices or switching plans.</p>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-04-30/1714510861-27954-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<p>This concludes a small arc of changes, with 2FA, QR login, and now these extra security checks. We hope these are working well for you! We'll continue building more supported login methods, and session management tools.</p>


<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Maps - feedback when calculating route between two points <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3910" data-id="3910" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3910</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a></li>
<li>Infinite scroll with second toolbar and Quick Answer on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3921" data-id="3921" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3921</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/equalidea" class="UserMention">@equalidea</a></li>
<li>On the home page, I can't go back to "Web" search after selecting Images/Videos/Podcasts <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3644" data-id="3644" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3644</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stylus" class="UserMention">@stylus</a></li>
<li>No way to return to web search on mobile front page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3928" data-id="3928" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3928</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a> </li>
<li>Standardise casing in search result actions menu <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3517" data-id="3517" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3517</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/adamaveray" class="UserMention">@adamaveray</a> </li>
<li>Fewer results per page toggle in settings gets result to enabled <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3901" data-id="3901" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3901</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Ishan512" class="UserMention">@Ishan512</a></li>
<li>Search terms with hyphens not reflected in image results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3887" data-id="3887" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3887</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/dharmab" class="UserMention">@dharmab</a></li>
<li>The image search breaks for some queries with special characters <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3889" data-id="3889" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3889</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/libussa" class="UserMention">@libussa</a></li>
<li>Summarizer displays time elapsed "undefineds" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3932" data-id="3932" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3932</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a></li>
<li>Keyboard shortcut to expand dictionary definition <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3692" data-id="3692" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3692</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a> </li>
<li>Difficult to read text in quick answer tooltip with dark theme <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3915" data-id="3915" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3915</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/classicsc" class="UserMention">@classicsc</a> </li>
<li>Dark 'Learn more' text on Billing plan page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3875" data-id="3875" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3875</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sw" class="UserMention">@sw</a></li>
<li>False quick answer results  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3165" data-id="3165" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3165</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Repacking6528" class="UserMention">@Repacking6528</a></li>
<li>Quick answer is wrong <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3814" data-id="3814" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3814</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/azdanov" class="UserMention">@azdanov</a></li>
<li>Lots of text missing from Quick Answer pulled from MathWorld (latex/SVG issue?) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3618" data-id="3618" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3618</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bert" class="UserMention">@bert</a></li>
<li>Kagi Assistant icon is not keyboard focusable on Kagi homepage <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3693" data-id="3693" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3693</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Prostagma" class="UserMention">@Prostagma</a> </li>
<li>Lens dropdown in Research overflows off the top of the screen in iOS Safari <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3481" data-id="3481" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3481</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/eapt" class="UserMention">@eapt</a></li>
<li>Model dropdown on kagi.com chat tab goes off the bottom of the screen <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3495" data-id="3495" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3495</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/eapt" class="UserMention">@eapt</a> </li>
<li>!expert mode is incorrectly showing references <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3657" data-id="3657" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3657</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/zut" class="UserMention">@zut</a></li>
<li>Assistant references uncited sources <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3918" data-id="3918" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3918</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bitzbyte" class="UserMention">@bitzbyte</a> </li>
<li>Can't continue conversation when assistant encounters a problem <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3880" data-id="3880" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3880</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/youngji22" class="UserMention">@youngji22</a></li>
<li>Research Assistant Is Highly Sensitive to Prompt <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3671" data-id="3671" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3671</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/EvacuatedTerminal" class="UserMention">@EvacuatedTerminal</a></li></ul></content>

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Features and announcements</h3>

<h5>QR code sign-in</h5>
<p>Now you can simply scan a QR code on Kagi's login page with an authenticated device to log into a new device. For more details, visit our <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/privacy/log-in-with-qr-code.html" rel="ugc nofollow">help page</a>. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2417" data-id="2417" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2417</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/FrederickZh" class="UserMention">@FrederickZh</a><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-04-16/1713289159-502879-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<h5>Sales tax rollout</h5>
<p>Starting this Sunday, April 21st, sales taxes will apply to all subscriptions. We have notified subscribers of this change via email. This marks the completion of the sales tax rollout. For further details, please visit our <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/faq/sales-tax-vat.html" rel="ugc nofollow">FAQ page</a>.</p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Add keyboard shortcuts shift-J/K to skip to next domain's results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2465" data-id="2465" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2465</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Deebster" class="UserMention">@Deebster</a></li>

<li>Lens settings has a incorrect input label or maybe an incorrect input field? Not sure... <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3845" data-id="3845" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3845</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/gunslingerfry" class="UserMention">@gunslingerfry</a></li>
<li>Provide feedback for copying code snippets <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3787" data-id="3787" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3787</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/adamaveray" class="UserMention">@adamaveray</a></li>
<li>Selecting text in Wolfram info pane in suggestions dropdown dismisses dropdown <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3779" data-id="3779" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3779</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bert" class="UserMention">@bert</a></li>
<li>Input query field has hidden clear button <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3687" data-id="3687" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3687</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mikeX" class="UserMention">@mikeX</a></li>
<li>The dog doesn't look away anymore <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3767" data-id="3767" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3767</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li>
<li>New Kagi design creates issues with Login page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3810" data-id="3810" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3810</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/hmnd" class="UserMention">@hmnd</a></li>
<li>'System Default' theme always uses light theme's theme colour <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3155" data-id="3155" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3155</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a></li>
<li>Kagi’s Landing and Sign-in Pages Should Also Support Adaptive Light/Dark Mode <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3782" data-id="3782" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3782</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/teethtaster" class="UserMention">@teethtaster</a> </li>
<li>New Kagi design creates issues with Login page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3810" data-id="3810" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3810</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/hmnd" class="UserMention">@hmnd</a></li>
<li>Royal Blue colours and links very broken <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3798" data-id="3798" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3798</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/CarwynNelson" class="UserMention">@CarwynNelson</a></li>

<li>Dark Royal Blue - switch plan info unreadable <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3833" data-id="3833" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3833</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a> </li>

<li>Kagi Homepage Overlay <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3774" data-id="3774" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3774</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lemonmaker" class="UserMention">@lemonmaker</a></li>
<li>There is no longer any difference between the two light modes. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3789" data-id="3789" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3789</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/MoroccanPigeon" class="UserMention">@MoroccanPigeon</a></li>
