<li>Research assistant gives error after 3 messages if pdf is uploaded (this input is not supported. (Invalid Input)) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3818" data-id="3818" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3818</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/aivalja" class="UserMention">@aivalja</a></li>
<li>Sort footnotes that appear below a "Quick Answer" into numerical order <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3794" data-id="3794" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3794</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/macalba" class="UserMention">@macalba</a></li></ul></content>

entries.description:
Features and announcements

QR code sign-in

Now you can simply scan a QR code on Kagi's login page with an authenticated device to log into a new device. For more details, visit our help page. #2417 @FrederickZh

Sales tax rollout

Starting this Sunday, April 21st, sales taxes will apply to all subscriptions. We have notified subscribers of this change via email. This marks the completion of the sales tax rollout. For further details, please visit our FAQ page.

Improvements and bug fixes

  • Add keyboard shortcuts shift-J/K to skip to next domain's results #2465 @Deebster
  • [Apperance][New UI] Plans do not show their differences anymore #3796 @igak_rekcartgub
  • Lens settings has a incorrect input label or maybe an incorrect input field? Not sure... #3845 @gunslingerfry
  • Provide feedback for copying code snippets #3787 @adamaveray
  • Selecting text in Wolfram info pane in suggestions dropdown dismisses dropdown #3779 @bert
  • Input query field has hidden clear button #3687 @mikeX
  • The dog doesn't look away anymore #3767 @httpjames
  • New Kagi design creates issues with Login page #3810 @hmnd
  • 'System Default' theme always uses light theme's theme colour #3155 @sefidel
  • Kagi’s Landing and Sign-in Pages
entries.title: April 20th, 2024 - Introducing QR code sign-in and final sales taxes update

entries.author: Luis

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html">
<h3>New Features and Updates</h3>

<h4>Refreshed UI design</h4>
<p>We're delighted to unveil our updated design of key search pages and a completely revamped settings experience, now featuring a fresh, new look!  Here's a sneak peek:</p>

<p><strong>Homepage</strong><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-04-10/1712779012-450004-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<p><strong>Settings</strong><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-04-09/1712697311-139640-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<p><strong>Onboarding</strong><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-04-10/1712778991-868771-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<h4>Assistant highlights</h4>
<ul><li>New model available: added Google's latest LLM, <strong>Gemini 1.5 Pro</strong></li>
<li>Privacy scores: we introduced an LLM privacy score (<a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/ai/assistant.html#chat-mode-scorecard-criteria" rel="ugc nofollow">details on how it's calculated</a>)</li>
<li>Enhanced citations: they now reference the segment of text used to generate the cited content<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-04-09/1712675828-398506-image.png" title="" alt=""></li></ul>

<h4>Sales tax rollout</h4>
<p>An update on our sales tax rollout plan. <strong>Effective today, sales tax will apply to all new customer accounts.</strong> For our existing customers, the implementation date is now set for <strong>April 16th</strong>. We will provide further details via email soon. In the meantime, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our team via email at <a href="mailto:support@kagi.com">support@kagi.com</a> or <a href="https://discord.gg/ePx84Hjb" rel="ugc nofollow">Discord</a>.</p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Improved discussions lens results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3424" data-id="3424" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3424</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/raphael" class="UserMention">@raphael</a></li>
<li>Some requests seem to take too much time to load <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3752" data-id="3752" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3752</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ak42" class="UserMention">@ak42</a></li>
<li>Github repos from different orgs should not fold as subresults <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/149" data-id="149" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#149</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/xvello" class="UserMention">@xvello</a></li>
<li>Search suggestion details break input field <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3727" data-id="3727" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3727</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/b-kaiser" class="UserMention">@b-kaiser</a></li>
<li>The search term variable, %s, is only evaluated once per bang <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3698" data-id="3698" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3698</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ph" class="UserMention">@ph</a></li>
<li>Small Web Lens does not honor blocked sites <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3725" data-id="3725" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3725</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/markkrueg" class="UserMention">@markkrueg</a></li>
<li>Kagi Knowledge wraps in middle of words <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3702" data-id="3702" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3702</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/yeri" class="UserMention">@yeri</a></li>
<li>Claude 3 Opus failing with "Sorry, a problem occurred while processing your request. Please try again later." <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3721" data-id="3721" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3721</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ak42" class="UserMention">@ak42</a> </li>
<li>URL highlighting in assistant <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3716" data-id="3716" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3716</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a></li>
<li>API/FastGPT keep failing on one particular query <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3713" data-id="3713" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3713</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a> </li>
<li>Summarizer fails with a YouTube link <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3704" data-id="3704" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3704</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a> </li>
<li>Research AI provides sources not in native language <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3658" data-id="3658" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3658</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bebowilson" class="UserMention">@bebowilson</a></li></ul></content>

New Features and Updates

Refreshed UI design

We're delighted to unveil our updated design of key search pages and a completely revamped settings experience, now featuring a fresh, new look! Here's a sneak peek:

Homepage

Settings

Onboarding

Sales tax rollout

We will provide further details via email soon. In the meantime, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our team via email at support@kagi.com or Discord.

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Features</h3>

<ul><li><p>We continue enhancing our search experience with bangs. Check the shield menu to see if a website has a corresponding bang. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3410" data-id="3410" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3410</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frereit" class="UserMention">@frereit</a><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-03-26/1711463744-90246-image.png" title="" alt=""></p></li>

<li><p>We've upgraded the <a href="https://kagi.com/fastgpt" rel="ugc nofollow">FastGPT</a>, and <a href="https://kagi.com/assistant" rel="ugc nofollow">Research Assistant</a> (Fast+Expert) with the latest models to enhance performance:</p>
 <ul><li>FastGPT -&gt; Claude 3 Haiku</li>
 <li>Research Assistant, Fast -&gt; Claude 3 Haiku</li>
 <li>Research Assistant, Expert -&gt; Claude 3 Sonnet</li></ul></li>
<li><p>These are also available in Chat mode which allows full access to a range of models like Claude 3 Opus, GPT-4 and Mistral Large [<em>Please note, Kagi Assistant is currently in closed beta and is exclusively accessible to subscribers of the Ultimate plan</em>]<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-03-26/1711457673-662718-image.png" title="" alt=""></p></li>
<li><p>We now allow the community to see and translate the trigger phrases for widgets that utilize them, such as the weather and calculator widgets. Learn more about how to contribute translations in our <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/support-and-community/contribute_translations.html" rel="ugc nofollow">help page</a>. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2506" data-id="2506" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2506</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cempack" class="UserMention">@cempack</a></p></li> </ul>



<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Show colour picker when searching for "colour picker" or "color picker" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3370" data-id="3370" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3370</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li>
<li>Clock Widget (ie, checking time in another time zone) initially shows PM instead of AM <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3533" data-id="3533" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3533</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mackid1993" class="UserMention">@mackid1993</a></li>
<li>Ultimate-exclusive bangs not working on starter plan <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3551" data-id="3551" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3551</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/emarforio" class="UserMention">@emarforio</a></li>
<li>Timer doesn't count time correctly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3436" data-id="3436" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3436</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/__rej__" class="UserMention">@__rej__</a></li>
<li>The enter key ignores the character selection state when using Chinese IME <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3606" data-id="3606" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3606</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/morningdip" class="UserMention">@morningdip</a></li>
<li>Unable to upload items between 8mb and 16mb <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3593" data-id="3593" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3593</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cakeboss" class="UserMention">@cakeboss</a></li>
<li>Search results have no title Firefox Android  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3586" data-id="3586" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3586</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ray" class="UserMention">@ray</a></li>
<li>Discussion cards  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3519" data-id="3519" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3519</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Dumb" class="UserMention">@Dumb</a></li>
<li>News Snippet cuts off menu <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3542" data-id="3542" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3542</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/xrendan" class="UserMention">@xrendan</a></li>
<li>Show that a bang is available in the info field of a result <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3410" data-id="3410" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3410</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frereit" class="UserMention">@frereit</a></li>
<li>Search ignoring pre-set date filter <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3417" data-id="3417" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3417</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/travior" class="UserMention">@travior</a></li>
<li>Check Listen Notes API integration <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3163" data-id="3163" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3163</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/matteoscopel" class="UserMention">@matteoscopel</a></li>
<li>Quick answer does not display footnotes correctly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3637" data-id="3637" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3637</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bebowilson" class="UserMention">@bebowilson</a> </li>
<li>Add bang country for Indonesia <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3515" data-id="3515" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3515</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rourguic" class="UserMention">@rourguic</a></li>
<li>Make stats subpages shareable <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3452" data-id="3452" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3452</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a></li>
<li>Updating a lens' bang causes the server to crash with 502 Server Error <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3601" data-id="3601" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3601</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a> </li>
<li>Assistant is still capping characters to 7k <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3547" data-id="3547" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3547</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a> </li>
<li>AI Assistant regenerates answer on tab restore/reopen when called from bang <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3569" data-id="3569" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3569</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/emarforio" class="UserMention">@emarforio</a></li>
<li>Quick answer button slightly misaligned on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3429" data-id="3429" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3429</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a></li>
<li>Stop overriding the browser’s scroll bars with custom CSS <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3420" data-id="3420" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3420</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/David" class="UserMention">@David</a></li>
<li>Using the bang !fast on Firefox iOS just gives me an emtpy window <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3597" data-id="3597" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3597</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lou" class="UserMention">@lou</a></li>
<li>Reddit and Hackernews backlinks only (?) work on us-central <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3277" data-id="3277" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3277</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nilsherzig" class="UserMention">@nilsherzig</a></li>
<li>Bangs in Image / Video / News / Podcast / Maps Search do not redirect. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2929" data-id="2929" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2929</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Syx" class="UserMention">@Syx</a></li>
<li>Lenses are not activated for research <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3317" data-id="3317" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3317</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tkataja" class="UserMention">@tkataja</a></li>
<li>Quick answer breaks when the query contains html tags <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3614" data-id="3614" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3614</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ys256" class="UserMention">@ys256</a></li>
<li>Research Expert Mode "forgets" Citations <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3612" data-id="3612" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3612</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tschoesi" class="UserMention">@tschoesi</a></li>
<li>Research Assistant cannot summarize GitHub issues URLs correctly (but it can as a PDF) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3581" data-id="3581" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3581</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/yokoffing" class="UserMention">@yokoffing</a></li>
<li>Missing citations in fastgpt / quickanswer again <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3625" data-id="3625" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3625</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/truethomas" class="UserMention">@truethomas</a> </li>
<li>Quick answer words end with numbers (without links to sources) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3628" data-id="3628" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3628</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bert" class="UserMention">@bert</a> </li>
<li>Blocked sites showing up in "Quick Peek" results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3477" data-id="3477" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3477</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/n6h6" class="UserMention">@n6h6</a></li>
<li>"Sorry, a problem occurred while processing your request." when using the bang "!expert" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3306" data-id="3306" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3306</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lou" class="UserMention">@lou</a></li></ul></content>

entries.description:
Features

  • We continue enhancing our search experience with bangs. Check the shield menu to see if a website has a corresponding bang. #3410 @frereit

  • We've upgraded the FastGPT, and Research Assistant (Fast+Expert) with the latest models to enhance performance:

    • FastGPT -> Claude 3 Haiku
    • Research Assistant, Fast -> Claude 3 Haiku
    • Research Assistant, Expert -> Claude 3 Sonnet

  • These are also available in Chat mode which allows full access to a range of models like Claude 3 Opus, GPT-4 and Mistral Large [Please note, Kagi Assistant is currently in closed beta and is exclusively accessible to subscribers of the Ultimate plan]

  • We now allow the community to see and translate the trigger phrases for widgets that utilize them, such as the weather and calculator widgets. Learn more about how to contribute translations in our help page. #2506 @cempack

Improvements and bug fixes

  • Show colour picker when searching for "colour picker" or "color picker" #3370 @httpjames
  • Clock Widget (ie, checking time in another time zone) initially shows PM instead of AM #3533 @mackid1993
  • Ultimate-exclusive bangs not working on starter plan #3551 @emarforio
  • Timer doesn't count time correctly #3436 @__rej__
  • The enter key ignores the character selection state when using Chinese IME
entries.title: March 26th, 2024 - Widget Triggers Open to Community Translations and Model Upgrades for FastGPT and Research Assistant

entries.author: Luis

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Announcements</h3>

<p>Starting from <strong>March 26th</strong>, we will <strong>begin including localized sales tax for all new customers</strong> who subscribe on or after this date.<br>
﻿<br>
Starting from <strong>April 9th, all existing customers who qualify for sales tax/VAT will see localized sales tax/VAT added to their monthly invoice in USD</strong>, on top of their current subscription fee. This adjustment will appear on your next invoice on or after April 9th, with no immediate extra charge.</p>

<p>If you are paying with an <strong>alternative method via Paypal, OpenNode, or any other non-Stripe provider</strong>: You will be prompted to pick a sales tax region the next time you go to purchase credit.<br>
﻿<br>
If you have any questions about this change, please feel free to contact our team through <a href="https://discord.gg/5V7qcs3X88" rel="ugc nofollow">Discord</a> or at <a href="mailto:support@kagi.com">support@kagi.com</a>. We will be building an F.A.Q. page to answer any questions about the migration process.</p>

<p>To clarify, it means an end-price increase for affected members (sales tax/VAT will be automatically added on top of Kagi price, if applicable in your country/state) and this is mandated by Kagi becoming large enough to have legal sales tax/VAT obligation. In addition, Kagi will have to retroactively pay for all sales tax/VAT that we did not collect in the last almost two years. We have chosen to absorb this on behalf of our customers.</p>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>We made some changes to Kagi-specific bangs: you can access FastGPT through <code>!fgpt</code> and Discuss doc with <code>!discussdoc</code></li>
<li>LaTeX is not displaying properly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3514" data-id="3514" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3514</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rourguic" class="UserMention">@rourguic</a> </li>
<li>Claude 3 Opus injects random mathematical formulae <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3564" data-id="3564" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3564</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tiltowait" class="UserMention">@tiltowait</a></li>
<li>Expert research assistant fails to process request <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3566" data-id="3566" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3566</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frin" class="UserMention">@frin</a></li>
<li>Research assistant messes up character spacing unpredictably <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3184" data-id="3184" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3184</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li>
<li>Duplicate bang search suggestion <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3379" data-id="3379" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3379</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a></li>
<li>Kagi Quick Answer Mismatch Between Document Number and Source Number <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3549" data-id="3549" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3549</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/benoit" class="UserMention">@benoit</a> </li>
<li>UI Bug: Chat Assistant models card has a clipboard icon <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3485" data-id="3485" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3485</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Chris" class="UserMention">@Chris</a></li>
<li>Maps keeps trying to get a location on every keystroke <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3405" data-id="3405" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3405</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tinkling6961" class="UserMention">@tinkling6961</a> </li>
<li><code>POST /login</code> returns HTTP 500 Internal Server Error <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3526" data-id="3526" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3526</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/pdm" class="UserMention">@pdm</a> </li>
<li>Non-ASCII Wikipedia URL incorrectly encoded <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3459" data-id="3459" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3459</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ThreePointsShort" class="UserMention">@ThreePointsShort</a></li>
<li>Kagi Assistant - Text Parsing Issue <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3390" data-id="3390" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3390</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/martafolf" class="UserMention">@martafolf</a></li></ul></content>

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Features</h3>

<ul><li>We've upgraded the Quick Answer keyboard shortcut. Pressing <code>q</code> triggers Quick Answer after search results are shown, but also allows you to control the level of detail displayed, letting you expand or condense the information to suit your needs <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3493" data-id="3493" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3493</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/yellow" class="UserMention">@yellow</a></li>
<li>Orion browser lifetime purchase w/ credits on balance is now possible</li>
<li>Added Thai language option <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3439" data-id="3439" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3439</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bocchi" class="UserMention">@bocchi</a></li> </ul>

<p>We currently have almost 20 languages localized. Our translation effort is crowd-sourced, and If you would like to contribute translations to Kagi, <a href="https://localazy.com/p/kagi-search" rel="ugc nofollow">click here</a>.</p>

<h3>Assistant</h3>

<ul><li>We increased the input character limits for Assistant to 16k characters  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3421" data-id="3421" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3421</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mackid1993" class="UserMention">@mackid1993</a>  </li>
<li>We have doubled the file upload limit for Assistant to 16 MB <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2705" data-id="2705" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2705</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Grooty" class="UserMention">@Grooty</a></li></ul>

<h3>Maps</h3>

<ul><li>Added support for multiple routing options in navigation (user can choose between up to 3 different routing options when navigating to a location)<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-03-12/1710265147-794214-image.png" title="" alt=""></li>
<li>Improved user experience and interface (UX/UI) behaviour when searches fail due to issues like lost Wi-Fi connection</li>
<li>Enhanced UX/UI behaviour for searches that hang or take too long to complete</li>
<li>Fixed the issue of missing quick-find results on the mobile dropdown menu</li>
<li>Refresh the style and design of navigation route map lines and markers for driving and walking directions to improve their visibility and clarity</li></ul>

<h3>Improvements and Bug Fixes</h3>

<ul><li>Eager prompting of time widget <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3207" data-id="3207" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3207</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Jake-Moss" class="UserMention">@Jake-Moss</a></li>
<li>Emails Are Case Sensitive <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3322" data-id="3322" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3322</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Cain" class="UserMention">@Cain</a></li>
<li>Dark background in the preview of some images makes it hard to see them <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/161" data-id="161" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#161</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/gesumin" class="UserMention">@gesumin</a></li>
<li>Missing superscript or subscript argument <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3211" data-id="3211" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3211</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/vogel" class="UserMention">@vogel</a></li>
<li>Aw, Snap! STATUS_STACK_OVERFLOW Chrome crash when using code ai chat <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3454" data-id="3454" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3454</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tboby" class="UserMention">@tboby</a></li>
<li>Link to Orion on stats <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3449" data-id="3449" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3449</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/dix" class="UserMention">@dix</a> </li>
<li>Provide context information like length and type for summarized URLs <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2855" data-id="2855" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2855</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mhersh" class="UserMention">@mhersh</a></li>
<li>Multi-line in chat causes the input box to overflow <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3466" data-id="3466" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3466</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sapourli" class="UserMention">@sapourli</a> </li>
<li>‘Custom instruction’ screen incorrectly rendering ‘blobs’ <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3502" data-id="3502" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3502</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/JamesT" class="UserMention">@JamesT</a> </li>
<li>Accessing /stats/ instead of /stats shows empty page. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3450" data-id="3450" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3450</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a></li>
<li>Search form and assistant messages submitted prematurely using some IMEs <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3406" data-id="3406" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3406</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/johnm" class="UserMention">@johnm</a></li>
<li>Claude 3 Opus response issue <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3433" data-id="3433" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3433</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Dumb" class="UserMention">@Dumb</a></li>
<li>Claude 3 Opus is very talky <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3435" data-id="3435" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3435</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a> </li>
<li>Assistant expert mode queries respond with (Invalid Input) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3442" data-id="3442" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3442</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/kagi-strut927" class="UserMention">@kagi-strut927</a></li>
<li>Code assistant: missing code fence <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3437" data-id="3437" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3437</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tiltowait" class="UserMention">@tiltowait</a></li></ul></content>

<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Announcements</h3>

<p>We are launching instant Summary Boxes, together with announcing <strong>partnership with Wolfram|Alpha</strong> and welcoming <strong>Stephen Wolfram to Kagi's board of advisors</strong>.</p>

<p>Read everything in our <a href="https://blog.kagi.com/kagi-wolfram" rel="ugc nofollow">blog post</a>.</p>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-03-05/1709654440-735786-screenshot-2024-03-05-at-080035.png" title="" alt=""></p>


<h3>Features</h3>

<ul><li><p>"<strong>Small YouTube</strong>" (part of Kagi Small Web) feed has been enhanced with more content, <a href="https://kagi.com/smallweb/?yt" rel="ugc nofollow">check it out<br>
</a> (+ <a href="https://kagi.com/api/v1/smallweb/feed?yt" rel="ugc nofollow">RSS feed</a> is available)</p></li>

<li><p>We've added <strong>Orion+ member count</strong> to our <a href="https://kagi.com/stats" rel="ugc nofollow">stats</a> page.</p></li>

<li><p>You can now <strong>summarise videos directly from the results page</strong> via three dots menu. You can even ask questions about it (as with any other result appearing in Kagi search).  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3269" data-id="3269" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3269</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Browsing6853" class="UserMention">@Browsing6853</a></p></li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-03-05/1709655383-811052-screenshot-2024-03-05-at-081603.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li><p>We've added <strong>keyboard shortcut for activating Quick Answer</strong>. Just press <code>q</code> on your keyboard after the results are loaded to get a quick summary of results. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3161" data-id="3161" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3161</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Browsing6853" class="UserMention">@Browsing6853</a></p>  </li>

<li><p>We added access to <strong>Mistral Large</strong> and <strong>Claude 3 Opus</strong> to <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/ai/assistant.html" rel="ugc nofollow">Assistant</a> (please note, the Assistant remains in beta and limited to Ultimate subscribers)<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-03-05/1709656830-160092-screenshot-2024-03-05-at-084015.png" title="" alt=""></p></li></ul>

<h3>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Simplified the onboarding process for Duo &amp; Family accounts via universal invitation links</li>
<li>Apple Sign In, then Set Password, Breaks Apple Sign In <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3330" data-id="3330" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3330</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/hanji" class="UserMention">@hanji</a></li>
<li>Handling for Desktop/Mobile Website Versions in Search Results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1727" data-id="1727" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1727</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Wisely" class="UserMention">@Wisely</a></li>
<li>Wrong results from currency converter <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3366" data-id="3366" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3366</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ioctl" class="UserMention">@ioctl</a> </li>
<li>Search option bar can be vertically scrolled after reloading if the bar contains Quick Answer button <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3328" data-id="3328" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3328</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a> </li>
<li>When you navigate back, the search query in the More Results button doesn't match the results. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3209" data-id="3209" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3209</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/xorgy" class="UserMention">@xorgy</a></li>
<li>Cannot click enter in search box android <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3315" data-id="3315" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3315</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/KaraZajac" class="UserMention">@KaraZajac</a> </li>
<li>Wolfram Alpha math result does not meet expectation <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3189" data-id="3189" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3189</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/brotis" class="UserMention">@brotis</a></li>
<li>Assistant doesn't remember last selected model in some situations <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3223" data-id="3223" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3223</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a></li>
<li>Further improvements to fix <code>$_latex_inline</code> in quick answer <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3225" data-id="3225" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3225</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bert" class="UserMention">@bert</a></li>
<li>The response <code>None</code> is returned by FastGPT <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3343" data-id="3343" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3343</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/AndreL" class="UserMention">@AndreL</a></li></ul></content>

entries.description:
Announcements

We are launching instant Summary Boxes, together with announcing partnership with Wolfram|Alpha and welcoming Stephen Wolfram to Kagi's board of advisors.

Read everything in our blog post.

Features

  • "Small YouTube" (part of Kagi Small Web) feed has been enhanced with more content, check it out
     (+ RSS feed is available)

  • We've added Orion+ member count to our stats page.

  • You can now summarise videos directly from the results page via three dots menu. You can even ask questions about it (as with any other result appearing in Kagi search). #3269 @Browsing6853

  • We've added keyboard shortcut for activating Quick Answer. Just press q on your keyboard after the results are loaded to get a quick summary of results. #3161 @Browsing6853

  • We added access to Mistral Large and Claude 3 Opus to Assistant (please note, the Assistant remains in beta and limited to Ultimate subscribers)

Improvements & Bug fixes

  • Simplified the onboarding process for Duo & Family accounts via universal invitation links
  • Apple Sign In, then Set Password, Breaks Apple Sign In #3330 @hanji
  • Handling for Desktop/Mobile Website Versions in Search Results #1727 @Wisely
  • Wrong results from currency converter #3366 @ioctl
  • Search option bar can be vertically
entries.title: March 5th, 2024 - Wolfram|Alpha partnership, Claude 3 Opus and Mistral Large in Assistant

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Features</h3>

<ul><li>We've made further progress in enhancing Bangs in the UI. And following the release of our <a href="https://github.com/kagisearch/bangs" rel="ugc nofollow">open-source bags repository</a>, the community has contributed by adding and fixing dozens of bangs already! Additionally, we upgraded all bangs to use HTTPS where possible.</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-27/1709048797-958196-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li>To further enhance user control, we now indicate when there are blocked results for your search queries  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2698" data-id="2698" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2698</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Fernandez" class="UserMention">@Fernandez</a>)</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-27/1709056705-913347-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>


<ul><li>We've introduced a new colour code search widget. It displays the selected colour, allows to pick an alternative, and to convert between HSL and RGB formats   <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/118" data-id="118" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#118</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/yokoffing" class="UserMention">@yokoffing</a>)</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-27/1709043438-115853-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>


<h4>Kagi for Safari 2.2.2</h4>
  <ul><li>If you were having issues with Kagi for Safari, make sure you are running the latest version and that 'Engine to redirect' option in extension settings is set to the one used by Safari. </li>
  <li>[Changed] Adopted monochrome icon for toolbar/menu to match Safari icon styles</li></ul>

<h3>Improvements and bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Kagi Quick Answer now remembers 'Show more" option  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3241" data-id="3241" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3241</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Dustin" class="UserMention">@Dustin</a></li>
<li>We've introduced a new progress animation for the Assistant's responses (please note, the Assistant remains in beta and limited to Ultimate subscribers)</li>
<li>Include non-US universities in Academic lens <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3303" data-id="3303" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3303</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rainfallwaterfallweb" class="UserMention">@rainfallwaterfallweb</a></li>
<li>Automatic Kagi Status Page Updates <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2914" data-id="2914" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2914</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/happinessattack" class="UserMention">@happinessattack</a> </li>
<li>Quotes cannot be used with assistant? <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3276" data-id="3276" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3276</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a></li>
<li>Quick answer freezes page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3237" data-id="3237" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3237</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/repelz" class="UserMention">@repelz</a> </li>
<li>LLM Model Help Chart - Add Cost and Context Window <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3049" data-id="3049" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3049</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/CrunchyFritos" class="UserMention">@CrunchyFritos</a></li>
<li>Error summarizing Von Neumann PDF <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2978" data-id="2978" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2978</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/CrunchyFritos" class="UserMention">@CrunchyFritos</a></li>
<li>Universal Summarizer on iOS should not scroll horizontally <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3251" data-id="3251" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3251</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/equalidea" class="UserMention">@equalidea</a></li>
<li>Site: search shows fewer results with "personalization" turned off <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3040" data-id="3040" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3040</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a> </li>
<li>Broken search dropdowns <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3278" data-id="3278" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3278</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/val" class="UserMention">@val</a></li>
<li>PDFs appear in image search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3289" data-id="3289" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3289</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/matteoscopel" class="UserMention">@matteoscopel</a></li>
<li>Quick Peek breaks with "[ CDATA" in question <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3308" data-id="3308" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3308</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/paszek" class="UserMention">@paszek</a></li>
<li>Taiwan(tw) bang is missing in region search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3287" data-id="3287" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3287</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/fc" class="UserMention">@fc</a></li>
<li>Site: search shows fewer results with "personalization" turned off <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3040" data-id="3040" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3040</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a> </li>
<li>Jisho bang encodes spaces incorrectly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3245" data-id="3245" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3245</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/adamaveray" class="UserMention">@adamaveray</a></li>
<li>Changelog formatting broken for lists <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3280" data-id="3280" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3280</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/VIEWVIEWVIEW" class="UserMention">@VIEWVIEWVIEW</a></li></ul></content>
