content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h2>Announcements</h2>

<ul><li><p><a href="https://github.com/kagisearch/bangs" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi Bangs repository</a> is now open source (thanks <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Browsing6853" class="UserMention">@Browsing6853</a> for suggesting this in <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/481" data-id="481" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#481</span></a>). You can now refine the accuracy of existing bangs or introduce new ones for everyone to enjoy on Kagi Search. Your contributions will enhance the search experience for users worldwide.</p></li>

<li><p>Fresh from Kagi Labs: We're shipping an alpha version of <a href="https://sidekick.kagi.com" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi Sidekick</a>, a search and "chat with content" solution for websites.</p>

  <p>Kagi Sidekick will offer instant site search results, and on-demand AI generated summaries, by tapping directly into the website's content. As a bonus, the website content will automatically (after opt-in) surface as a part of Kagi search index.</p>

  <p>You can see Sidekick live in action in <a href="https://help.kagi.com/kagi/" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi's documentation</a>.</p>

  <p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-08/1707409753-335221-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

  <p>We'd love to hear <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3123-kagi-sidekick" rel="ugc nofollow">your feedback</a>, and how would you use it on your website. We will plan the launch based on incoming demand.</p>

  <p>Visit the <a href="https://sidekick.kagi.com" rel="ugc nofollow">Sidekick project landing page</a> to learn more and register your interest for a beta invite. If you'd like to participate in building projects like this, Kagi Labs is <a href="https://help.kagi.com/common/company/hiring-kagi.html#part-time-opportunities" rel="ugc nofollow">hiring</a> part-time contributors.</p></li></ul>


<h2>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h2>

<ul><li>Faster and enhanced autocomplete in Kagi Maps</li>
<li>We added the option to disable Quick Answers through your <a href="https://kagi.com/settings?p=search" rel="ugc nofollow">Search Settings</a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3185" data-id="3185" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3185</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/TyrelSouza" class="UserMention">@TyrelSouza</a></li>
<li>You can now turn off Kagi's changelog notifications in <a href="https://kagi.com/settings?p=user_details" rel="ugc nofollow">Account Settings</a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2722" data-id="2722" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2722</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ChristenGottschlich" class="UserMention">@ChristenGottschlich</a> </li>
<li>Found a query that returns no results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3147" data-id="3147" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3147</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rossdanderson" class="UserMention">@rossdanderson</a></li>
<li>Completely unrelated search result <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3248" data-id="3248" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3248</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/raphael" class="UserMention">@raphael</a></li>
<li>Weird/unrelated result from search query <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3173" data-id="3173" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3173</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/arcaneasada" class="UserMention">@arcaneasada</a></li>
<li>Images fail to load from various sources with a 404 in Assistant <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3154" data-id="3154" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3154</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mojolobo" class="UserMention">@mojolobo</a></li>
<li>"Summarize in Document Language" detecting the wrong language <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3202" data-id="3202" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3202</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lou" class="UserMention">@lou</a></li>
<li>AI Research Assistant does not always provide sources <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3138" data-id="3138" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3138</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cmooon" class="UserMention">@cmooon</a></li>
<li>Discuss Url has a display bug <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3081" data-id="3081" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3081</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/unruffled5088" class="UserMention">@unruffled5088</a></li>
<li>UX: Cannot untoggle image search filters. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3168" data-id="3168" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3168</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Chris" class="UserMention">@Chris</a></li>
<li>Summarize page is broken for every quora result <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3149" data-id="3149" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3149</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Browsing6853" class="UserMention">@Browsing6853</a> </li>
<li>Add hyperlink at wolfram alpha instant answers to wolfram alpha website <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3195" data-id="3195" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3195</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Browsing6853" class="UserMention">@Browsing6853</a> </li>
<li>Time converter is buggy <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3180" data-id="3180" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3180</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Oni-giri" class="UserMention">@Oni-giri</a></li>
<li>Quick Peek on iOS missing foldable arrow graphics <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3158" data-id="3158" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3158</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/equalidea" class="UserMention">@equalidea</a> </li>
<li>Inline images should not scroll vertically on iOS <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3159" data-id="3159" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3159</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/equalidea" class="UserMention">@equalidea</a> </li>
<li>Add a "Remove results from this site" in dropdown to temporarily remove said site from showing up in results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3019" data-id="3019" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3019</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/FurbyOnSteroids" class="UserMention">@FurbyOnSteroids</a> </li>
<li>Better expose bangs <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2940" data-id="2940" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2940</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/leftium" class="UserMention">@leftium</a></li>
<li>Lenses with glob exclude doesn't work <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3157" data-id="3157" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3157</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Orhideous" class="UserMention">@Orhideous</a></li>
<li>Bangs regarding fedora package search are broken <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3234" data-id="3234" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3234</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/strom" class="UserMention">@strom</a></li>
<li>Tldr bang redirects to offline page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3230" data-id="3230" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3230</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stzsch" class="UserMention">@stzsch</a></li>
<li>Image search is surfacing non-free licensed images, despite license filters <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2964" data-id="2964" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2964</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/KagiForMe" class="UserMention">@KagiForMe</a></li>
<li>Jarring truncated quick answer text <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3210" data-id="3210" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3210</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Jake-Moss" class="UserMention">@Jake-Moss</a></li>
<li>Add table borders to assistant outputs <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3200" data-id="3200" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3200</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/platyhsu" class="UserMention">@platyhsu</a></li>
<li>Can't select text in kagi summarizer textbox <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3175" data-id="3175" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3175</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a></li>
<li>Shouldn’t Options - Options really be “Personalized results” <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3033" data-id="3033" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3033</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a></li>
<li>When navigating images they are in bad resolution for a second or so until they become sharp <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3242" data-id="3242" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3242</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/eltaco" class="UserMention">@eltaco</a></li>
<li>Open search bar icon doesn't pop up on Mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3258" data-id="3258" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3258</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sefidel" class="UserMention">@sefidel</a></li>
<li>Kagi persists old query when switching from web to image results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3226" data-id="3226" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3226</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/iivvoo" class="UserMention">@iivvoo</a></li>
<li><code>$_latex_inline</code> in quick answer <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3225" data-id="3225" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3225</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bert" class="UserMention">@bert</a></li></ul>

</content>

entries.description:
Announcements

  • Kagi Bangs repository is now open source (thanks @Browsing6853 for suggesting this in #481). You can now refine the accuracy of existing bangs or introduce new ones for everyone to enjoy on Kagi Search. Your contributions will enhance the search experience for users worldwide.

  • Fresh from Kagi Labs: We're shipping an alpha version of Kagi Sidekick, a search and "chat with content" solution for websites.

    Kagi Sidekick will offer instant site search results, and on-demand AI generated summaries, by tapping directly into the website's content. As a bonus, the website content will automatically (after opt-in) surface as a part of Kagi search index.

    You can see Sidekick live in action in Kagi's documentation.

    We'd love to hear your feedback, and how would you use it on your website. We will plan the launch based on incoming demand.

    Visit the Sidekick project landing page to learn more and register your interest for a beta invite. If you'd like to participate in building projects like this, Kagi Labs is hiring part-time contributors.

Improvements & Bug fixes

  • Faster and enhanced autocomplete in Kagi Maps
  • We added the option to disable Quick Answers through your Search Settings #3185 @TyrelSouza
  • You can now turn off Kagi's changelog notifications in Account Settings #2722 @ChristenGottschlich
entries.title: Feb 20, 2024 - Kagi Bangs go open-source, Kagi Sidekick concept plus numerous improvements and bug fixes

entries.author: Luis

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Features</h3>


<ul><li><p>We added <strong>Wolfram|Alpha to enhance our capabilities in calculations, unit conversions, and time</strong> queries for better results. This solves a huge number of issues reported for these kind of queries as the results now come from a computational knowledge authorithy.</p>

 <p>(Wolfram Alpha integration for fact based queries <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1271" data-id="1271" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1271</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Recast" class="UserMention">@Recast</a>)</p></li></ul>


<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-13/1707850630-598677-screenshot-2024-02-13-at-105705.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-13/1707852556-300223-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li>In the same spirit of <strong>getting answers faster</strong>, now simply starting your query with an interrogative word (what, where, who, which, when, how) or just ending it with a question mark (?) will <strong>automatically trigger Quick Answer</strong>:</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-13/1707851550-889014-screenshot-2024-02-13-at-111224.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-13/1707851590-997746-screenshot-2024-02-13-at-111305.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li><p>Video results will now feature <strong>duration, channel name and timestamp</strong>  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2970" data-id="2970" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2970</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/blosh" class="UserMention">@blosh</a>)<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-13/1707850745-196425-screenshot-2024-02-13-at-105856.png" title="" alt=""></p></li>

<li><p>You can now <strong>hear how words are pronounced</strong> directly in our dictionary results, <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/321" data-id="321" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#321</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Yuu" class="UserMention">@Yuu</a> <br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-13/1707849305-551491-image.png" title="" alt=""></p></li>

<li><p>We've introduced a new feature in Research Assistant that allows you to <strong>use your lenses to narrow down the scope of search results in Assistant</strong>   <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2147" data-id="2147" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2147</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/truethomas" class="UserMention">@truethomas</a>)<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-13/1707840034-526042-image.png" title="" alt=""></p></li></ul>


<h3>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h3>

<ul><li>Switch between search and assistant mode without clearing the search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2390" data-id="2390" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2390</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mackid1993" class="UserMention">@mackid1993</a></li>
<li>Time Ascending/Descending should contextually change to facilitate understanding <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1387" data-id="1387" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1387</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/kf" class="UserMention">@kf</a> </li>
<li>Ctrl+V for assistant upload <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3024" data-id="3024" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3024</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a></li>
<li>Billing page does not have a way to show detailed consumption statistics on Trial plan <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3052" data-id="3052" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3052</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/aochagavia" class="UserMention">@aochagavia</a></li>
<li>Turn Off Search Suggestions for Kids Accounts <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3070" data-id="3070" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3070</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/keen_dog" class="UserMention">@keen_dog</a></li>
<li>Searching for a unicode sequence always opens first result <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3078" data-id="3078" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3078</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cvzakharchenko" class="UserMention">@cvzakharchenko</a> </li>
<li>Video search timestamps incorrect <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3117" data-id="3117" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3117</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Amino4873" class="UserMention">@Amino4873</a></li>
<li>Bang completion in browser search bar <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1967" data-id="1967" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1967</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a> </li>
<li>Semicolons aren't properly handled in the search results page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2365" data-id="2365" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2365</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/laiz" class="UserMention">@laiz</a></li>
<li>Markup sneaking into calculation responses <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3053" data-id="3053" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3053</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/anotherhue" class="UserMention">@anotherhue</a></li>
<li>Quick Answer on iOS erroneously enables horizontal scroll <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3166" data-id="3166" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3166</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/equalidea" class="UserMention">@equalidea</a> </li>
<li>Flight widget “show more” does not work on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3136" data-id="3136" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3136</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a></li>
<li>Copying from Assistant while it is writing it's answer doesn't work <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2596" data-id="2596" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2596</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Grooty" class="UserMention">@Grooty</a></li>
<li>[UI] popover for paid sites does not display on Mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3076" data-id="3076" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3076</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/heliostatic" class="UserMention">@heliostatic</a></li>
<li>Assistant answer format  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3068" data-id="3068" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3068</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cardinal086" class="UserMention">@cardinal086</a></li>
<li>Pressing <code>c</code> while renaming a family will open the menu <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3105" data-id="3105" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3105</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/catgirlinspace" class="UserMention">@catgirlinspace</a></li>
<li>Quick answer gives no answer <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3108" data-id="3108" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3108</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/X145678908765" class="UserMention">@X145678908765</a></li>
<li>Assistant citation quotation do nothing on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3085" data-id="3085" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3085</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a></li></ul>

<h3>Fixed with Wolfram|Alpha computation integration</h3>

<ul><li>Incorrect timezone conversion <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2342" data-id="2342" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2342</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Crafty9853" class="UserMention">@Crafty9853</a></li>
<li>Crypto to fiat conversation, increase floating point precision for cryptocurrency <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2348" data-id="2348" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2348</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mccowen" class="UserMention">@mccowen</a></li>
<li>Calculator struggling with percentages <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2566" data-id="2566" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2566</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Krmloo" class="UserMention">@Krmloo</a></li>
<li>Time conversion using city/region/country names and current location <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/756" data-id="756" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#756</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tychoregter" class="UserMention">@tychoregter</a></li>
<li>Improve calculator widget <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2505" data-id="2505" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2505</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/EvacuatedTerminal" class="UserMention">@EvacuatedTerminal</a></li>
<li>"time argentina" uses wrong timezone <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2482" data-id="2482" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2482</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bwkagi" class="UserMention">@bwkagi</a></li>
<li>Can't convert "bytes to MB" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2481" data-id="2481" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2481</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jesus" class="UserMention">@jesus</a></li>
<li>Wrong time <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2377" data-id="2377" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2377</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Edweis" class="UserMention">@Edweis</a></li>
<li>Speed conversion widget <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2362" data-id="2362" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2362</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lumpycustard" class="UserMention">@lumpycustard</a></li>
<li>Asking from Cyprus time gives wrong answer <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2032" data-id="2032" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2032</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/asolovyov" class="UserMention">@asolovyov</a></li>
<li>Calculator widget appears to be haunted (wrong results for MANY things) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2289" data-id="2289" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2289</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/puppy" class="UserMention">@puppy</a></li>
<li>Gallon to oz - unknown  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2212" data-id="2212" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2212</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/partlycloudy" class="UserMention">@partlycloudy</a></li>
<li>Conversion to minutes fails if using <code>min</code> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2082" data-id="2082" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2082</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/xeophon" class="UserMention">@xeophon</a></li>
<li>Add natural language maths to calculator <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2061" data-id="2061" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2061</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/StarMaze" class="UserMention">@StarMaze</a></li>
<li>Calculator gives wrong answer for 2<sup>63 <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1953" data-id="1953" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1953</span></a></sup> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rookwood101" class="UserMention">@rookwood101</a></li>
<li>Unit converter can't handle small numbers <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1995" data-id="1995" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1995</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ThreePointsShort" class="UserMention">@ThreePointsShort</a></li>
<li>Recognize comma as decimal separator <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2743" data-id="2743" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2743</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jstolarek" class="UserMention">@jstolarek</a></li>
<li>A search for 'Eastern Time' brings up the wrong time zone <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/243" data-id="243" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#243</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/CorlinP" class="UserMention">@CorlinP</a></li>
<li>"Current time in ___" does not bring up time zone widget <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/99" data-id="99" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#99</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lacikawiz" class="UserMention">@lacikawiz</a></li>
<li>Time zone conversion uses wrong time zone <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1075" data-id="1075" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1075</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Jake-Moss" class="UserMention">@Jake-Moss</a></li>
<li>Time Converter widget doesn't account for summer time <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1031" data-id="1031" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1031</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Kai" class="UserMention">@Kai</a></li>
<li>Time widget is broken <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1053" data-id="1053" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1053</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/test41" class="UserMention">@test41</a></li>
<li>Time conversion is incorrect <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1386" data-id="1386" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1386</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/alanb" class="UserMention">@alanb</a></li>
<li>Time widget thinks Palestine is five hours ahead of Israel <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2985" data-id="2985" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2985</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cybiko123" class="UserMention">@cybiko123</a></li>
<li>"Time in argentina" is incorrect <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1379" data-id="1379" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1379</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/kagiar" class="UserMention">@kagiar</a></li>
<li>3pm PT is about pacific time <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/355" data-id="355" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#355</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/matkoniecz" class="UserMention">@matkoniecz</a></li>
<li>'Time in Equador' returns incorrect offset <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1212" data-id="1212" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1212</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/SamSkjord" class="UserMention">@SamSkjord</a></li>
<li>Clock Widget - No/Odd results for some european microstates <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/25" data-id="25" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#25</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Deucalion" class="UserMention">@Deucalion</a></li>
<li>Wrong timezone conversion for IST to CEST and wrong usage of CET/CEST <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1669" data-id="1669" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1669</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Nankeru" class="UserMention">@Nankeru</a></li>
<li>Widget for time span (e.g.  "38 days from now", "38 days from today") <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/119" data-id="119" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#119</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/yokoffing" class="UserMention">@yokoffing</a></li>
<li>Nautical miles unit conversion <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1117" data-id="1117" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1117</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/dharmab" class="UserMention">@dharmab</a></li>
<li>Currency conversion search too slow <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1116" data-id="1116" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1116</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Tomotake" class="UserMention">@Tomotake</a></li>
<li>Fl oz conversion does not work in all regions <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1883" data-id="1883" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1883</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mon" class="UserMention">@mon</a></li>
<li>Convert kJ to Calories <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2775" data-id="2775" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2775</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/gateway" class="UserMention">@gateway</a></li>
<li>Weird behavior when converting temperature <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/557" data-id="557" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#557</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/trekt" class="UserMention">@trekt</a></li>
<li>Incorrect decimal separator for calculation results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1336" data-id="1336" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1336</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/hmnd" class="UserMention">@hmnd</a></li>
<li>Allow commas for large numbers in calculator <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/136" data-id="136" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#136</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lacikawiz" class="UserMention">@lacikawiz</a></li>
<li>Time conversion doesn't use daylight savings <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/344" data-id="344" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#344</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rozbb" class="UserMention">@rozbb</a></li>
<li>Need more decimal places in USD-BTC conversion <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1256" data-id="1256" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1256</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/SK" class="UserMention">@SK</a></li>
<li>Time conversion to daylight time <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1433" data-id="1433" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1433</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/matkam" class="UserMention">@matkam</a></li>
<li>Currency Conversion Error <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2910" data-id="2910" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2910</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cempack" class="UserMention">@cempack</a></li>
<li>Calculator widget doesn't support shortenings of storage units (GB vs gigabyte) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1642" data-id="1642" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1642</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Grooty" class="UserMention">@Grooty</a></li>
<li>Wrong calculator results when region set to Singapore <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1216" data-id="1216" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1216</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bh" class="UserMention">@bh</a></li>
<li>Math calculations round to 0 after e8 <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2767" data-id="2767" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2767</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/rudyfink" class="UserMention">@rudyfink</a></li>
<li>Calculator ignores commas. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2323" data-id="2323" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2323</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/guissmo" class="UserMention">@guissmo</a></li></ul>

<h2>In other news</h2>

<p>Kagi got a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kagi_%28search_engine%29" rel="ugc nofollow">Wikipedia page</a>!</p>

</content>

entries.description:
Features

  • We added Wolfram|Alpha to enhance our capabilities in calculations, unit conversions, and time queries for better results. This solves a huge number of issues reported for these kind of queries as the results now come from a computational knowledge authorithy.

    (Wolfram Alpha integration for fact based queries #1271 @Recast)

  • In the same spirit of getting answers faster, now simply starting your query with an interrogative word (what, where, who, which, when, how) or just ending it with a question mark (?) will automatically trigger Quick Answer:

  • Video results will now feature duration, channel name and timestamp #2970 @blosh)

  • You can now hear how words are pronounced directly in our dictionary results, #321 @Yuu

  • We've introduced a new feature in Research Assistant that allows you to use your lenses to narrow down the scope of search results in Assistant #2147 @truethomas)

Improvements & Bug fixes

  • Switch between search and assistant mode without clearing the search #2390 @mackid1993
  • Time Ascending/Descending should contextually change to facilitate understanding #1387 @kf
  • Ctrl+V for assistant upload #3024 @Value7609
  • Billing page does not have a way to show detailed consumption
entries.title: Feb 13, 2024 - Faster and more accurate instant answers. And we got a Wikipedia page!

entries.author: Luis

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Features</h3>
<ul><li>We're happy to announce that Family and Duo plan members can now upgrade to Ultimate plan features for just $15 per month. per family member upgraded. The Ultimate plan includes access to the latest AI models, such as GPT-4/GPT-4-Turbo, Claude 2.1 (100k) and soon Gemini Ultra. To upgrade your account or that of another member, simply visit the "Members" section under <a href="https://www.kagi.com/settings?p=account_members" rel="ugc nofollow">Family Settings</a>.</li></ul>
<p> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2024" data-id="2024" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2024</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nucleardog" class="UserMention">@nucleardog</a></p>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-08/1707408105-538813-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li><a href="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/kagi-for-safari/id1622835804" rel="ugc nofollow">Kagi for Safari 2.2.0</a> is released, fixing many previous issues reported by the users.</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-08/1707412278-840815-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>


<ul><li>We've improved the mobile experience for Assistant users. Now, Now, when composing your prompt, you can effortlessly access settings for Assistant, including options for Research mode and Chat mode. Additionally, the entire prompt is now fully visible.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-08/1707415219-743952-image.png" title="" alt=""></li></ul>

<h3>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Kagi search on Firefox ESR 78 give JS error (previously fixed but happening again) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3055" data-id="3055" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3055</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/kagi-not-working" class="UserMention">@kagi-not-working</a> </li>
<li>Weather Widget Doesn't Display when Asking for Temperature <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3046" data-id="3046" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3046</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bhagwad" class="UserMention">@bhagwad</a></li>
<li>/ (slash) keyboard shortcut doesn't scroll to top in safari <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2989" data-id="2989" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2989</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/nullable" class="UserMention">@nullable</a></li>
<li>Quick answer does not always show up on results page <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3035" data-id="3035" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3035</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a></li> </ul></content>

entries.description:
Features

  • We're happy to announce that Family and Duo plan members can now upgrade to Ultimate plan features for just $15 per month. per family member upgraded. The Ultimate plan includes access to the latest AI models, such as GPT-4/GPT-4-Turbo, Claude 2.1 (100k) and soon Gemini Ultra. To upgrade your account or that of another member, simply visit the "Members" section under Family Settings.

#2024 @nucleardog

  • Kagi for Safari 2.2.0 is released, fixing many previous issues reported by the users.

  • We've improved the mobile experience for Assistant users. Now, Now, when composing your prompt, you can effortlessly access settings for Assistant, including options for Research mode and Chat mode. Additionally, the entire prompt is now fully visible.

Improvements & Bug fixes

  • Kagi search on Firefox ESR 78 give JS error (previously fixed but happening again) #3055 @kagi-not-working
  • Weather Widget Doesn't Display when Asking for Temperature #3046 @bhagwad
  • / (slash) keyboard shortcut doesn't scroll to top in safari #2989 @nullable
  • Quick answer does not always show up on results page #3035 @stoyle
entries.title: Feb 8, 2024 - Ultimate features available for Family / Duo plans

entries.author: Luis

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Features</h3>

<ul><li><p>Two-factor authentication (2FA) is now possible to further secure your Kagi account . This was the most upvoted feature on kagifeedback.org and we are glad to (finally) deliver it. You can <a href="https://kagi.com/settings?p=2fa_setup" rel="ugc nofollow">set it up</a> on your Settings page under the "Account" section. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Kai" class="UserMention">@Kai</a> in <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/14" data-id="14" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#14</span></a></p>

 <p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-06/1707252573-299972-screenshot-2024-02-06-at-124926.png" title="" alt=""></p></li></ul>


<ul><li><p>We added indication of results coming from Kagi's own index. Look for doggo graphics in results information popup.</p>

  <p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-06/1707236132-683351-screenshot-2024-02-06-at-081525.png" title="" alt=""></p></li></ul>


<ul><li>We've introduced the possibility to customise how hours are displayed in your account—choose between the 12 and 24-hour formats. To access this option, simply navigate to "General" under your account settings.<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-02-06/1707230712-907319-image.png" title="" alt=""></li></ul>


<h3>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h3>
<ul><li>Issues with how Quick Answer refers to search result items <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3000" data-id="3000" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3000</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/leftium" class="UserMention">@leftium</a> </li>
<li>We continued tacking accessibility issues reported in <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2923" data-id="2923" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2923</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/darekkay" class="UserMention">@darekkay</a> </li>
<li>Additional features for news and other articles <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2932" data-id="2932" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2932</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Dumb" class="UserMention">@Dumb</a></li>
<li>Calculator broken for basic mathematics <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3087" data-id="3087" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3087</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/bgeron" class="UserMention">@bgeron</a> </li>
<li>Wrong title for search result <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2984" data-id="2984" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2984</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/strager" class="UserMention">@strager</a></li>
<li>Translation/Localization on "Phone" button and "Opens soon X PM/AM" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2976" data-id="2976" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2976</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/TheLastEnvoy" class="UserMention">@TheLastEnvoy</a></li>
<li>Relaxed password restrictions to meet most <a href="https://pages.nist.gov/800-63-3/sp800-63b.html" rel="ugc nofollow">recent standards</a></li>
<li>Redirect rules do not trim white space <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3064" data-id="3064" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3064</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/gunslingerfry" class="UserMention">@gunslingerfry</a></li>
<li>Safari for iOS Results Page Too Wide <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3026" data-id="3026" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3026</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/TVPaulD" class="UserMention">@TVPaulD</a> </li>
<li>Site details can be dismissed before it finishes appearing <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1798" data-id="1798" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1798</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tuesday" class="UserMention">@tuesday</a></li>
<li>Switch between search and assistant mode without clearing the search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2390" data-id="2390" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2390</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mackid1993" class="UserMention">@mackid1993</a></li>
<li>Inline LaTeX response in quick answer not rendering properly <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3008" data-id="3008" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3008</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/gladiator2339" class="UserMention">@gladiator2339</a>
 <ul><li>$_latex_inline in AI output <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3073" data-id="3073" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3073</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/MightyPork" class="UserMention">@MightyPork</a> </li>
 <li>Quick Answer renders "$" as "$_latex_inline" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3032" data-id="3032" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3032</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/arinazari" class="UserMention">@arinazari</a></li></ul></li>
<li>Maps:
  <ul><li>Improve the UI-layout of the Inline-Maps Component on the Main Page</li>
  <li>Fix rendering bug in Directions</li>
  <li>Improvements to UI layout of POI Infobox</li></ul></li></ul>
  <br>
</content>

entries.description:
Features

  • Two-factor authentication (2FA) is now possible to further secure your Kagi account . This was the most upvoted feature on kagifeedback.org and we are glad to (finally) deliver it. You can set it up on your Settings page under the "Account" section. @Kai in #14

  • We added indication of results coming from Kagi's own index. Look for doggo graphics in results information popup.

  • We've introduced the possibility to customise how hours are displayed in your account—choose between the 12 and 24-hour formats. To access this option, simply navigate to "General" under your account settings.

Improvements & Bug fixes

  • Issues with how Quick Answer refers to search result items #3000 @leftium
  • We continued tacking accessibility issues reported in #2923 @darekkay
  • Additional features for news and other articles #2932 @Dumb
  • Calculator broken for basic mathematics #3087 @bgeron
  • Wrong title for search result #2984 @strager
  • Translation/Localization on "Phone" button and "Opens soon X PM/AM" #2976 @TheLastEnvoy
  • Relaxed password restrictions to meet most recent standards
  • Redirect rules do not trim white space #3064 @gunslingerfry
  • Safari for iOS Results Page Too Wide #3026 @TVPaulD
entries.title: Feb 6, 2024 - Two-factor authentication

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h3>

<ul><li>The weather widget now features a location button for users to set their precise location</li>
<li>Region search doesn't work when a lens is active <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2933" data-id="2933" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2933</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Vapid" class="UserMention">@Vapid</a></li>
<li>Inconsistent enrichment API results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2888" data-id="2888" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2888</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Value7609" class="UserMention">@Value7609</a> </li>
<li>!m Maps Bang doesn't search <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2945" data-id="2945" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2945</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/andyrew1" class="UserMention">@andyrew1</a></li>
<li>Search param dropdowns stay open <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2902" data-id="2902" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2902</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jrileyh" class="UserMention">@jrileyh</a></li>
<li>Blank page after signup <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2939" data-id="2939" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2939</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/petiole" class="UserMention">@petiole</a> </li>
<li>Time Ascending/Descending should contextually change to facilitate understanding <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1387" data-id="1387" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1387</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/kf" class="UserMention">@kf</a></li>
<li>Search input field initially scrolled out of view on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2958" data-id="2958" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2958</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tacocat" class="UserMention">@tacocat</a></li>
<li>Increased number of image search results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2785" data-id="2785" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2785</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/KimLaughton" class="UserMention">@KimLaughton</a></li>
<li>Maps search is broken; just returns local area <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/3015" data-id="3015" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#3015</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jamescridland" class="UserMention">@jamescridland</a></li></ul>

<h3>Assistant</h3>

<p>Research Assistant now displays the uploaded reference photo on the right side during chat conversations for easy reference<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-30/1706616058-706586-image.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li>Universal Summarizer now shows the reading time "saved" by summarizing a web page</li>
<li>Make Kagi Assistant's sources respect regex redirects <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2602" data-id="2602" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2602</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Kel" class="UserMention">@Kel</a></li>
<li>Research is not being given full context of the conversation <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2950" data-id="2950" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2950</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li>
<li>Assistant input form doesn't allow newlines on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2731" data-id="2731" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2731</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/EvacuatedTerminal" class="UserMention">@EvacuatedTerminal</a></li>
<li>Assistant switching language during conversation <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2982" data-id="2982" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2982</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/lou" class="UserMention">@lou</a></li></ul>

<h3>In other news</h3>

<ul><li><a href="https://teclis.com" rel="ugc nofollow">Teclis</a> is live again. Teclis surfaces most of Kagi's own index (non-commercial content) in a public way. Teclis is a hobby project by Kagi founder,  maintained on a best effort single person basis, just to set the right expectations.</li></ul>
</content>

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h3>Announcements</h3>

<p>Today, we’re happy and proud to have reached <strong>20,000 members</strong>.</p>

<p>We have a special surprise for our community. Read everything about it in our <a href="https://blog.kagi.com/celebrating-20k" rel="ugc nofollow">blog post</a>.</p>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-23/1706048250-795569-kagi-stickers.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<h3>Features</h3>
<ul><li>Kagi search extension for <a href="https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/kagi-search-for-chrome/cdglnehniifkbagbbombnjghhcihifij?hl=en-Us" rel="ugc nofollow">Chrome</a> and <a href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/kagi-search-for-firefox/" rel="ugc nofollow">Firefox</a> 0.5.0 released
  <ul><li>Added support for FastGPT</li>
  <li>Fix: Kagi Extension API Key Not Persistent in Firefox ESR on Kali Linux <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2234" data-id="2234" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2234</span></a> @Maxpl01Z</li>
  <li>Fix: Kagi keeps saying invalid session token in firefox on linux after setting up successfully and working fine for a while. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2090" data-id="2090" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2090</span></a> @bkw777a</li>
  <li>Fix: Firefox default search engine keeps resetting <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2748" data-id="2748" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2748</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Tulip" class="UserMention">@Tulip</a></li> </ul></li></ul>


<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-24/1706110928-788953-screenshot-2024-01-24-at-074142.png" title="" alt=""></p>




<ul><li>We've introduced an option to disable all personalizations (like blocked or raised domains) for your current search. Just click on "Options" — found at the top of the search results — and deselect "Personalized". Suggested by  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1943" data-id="1943" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1943</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a><br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-24/1706136800-302539-image.png" title="" alt=""></li></ul>


<ul><li>New, automated <a href="https://status.kagi.com" rel="ugc nofollow">status page</a> following the learnings from the <a href="https://status.kagi.com/clrnl9zwl97290beoine8zlvzx" rel="ugc nofollow">post-mortem</a> last week</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-24/1706111630-443135-screenshot-2024-01-24-at-075345.png" title="" alt=""></p>


<h3>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h3>

<ul><li>Accessibility improvements <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2923" data-id="2923" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2923</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/darekkay" class="UserMention">@darekkay</a></li>
<li>Perform a reverse image search with Kagi by pasting any image directly from your clipboard into the search bar. Suggested by <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1704" data-id="1704" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1704</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/VIEWVIEWVIEW" class="UserMention">@VIEWVIEWVIEW</a></li>
<li>Search yields no results <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2953" data-id="2953" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2953</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/flat_reward" class="UserMention">@flat_reward</a></li>
<li>"Time in Japan" shows the Wikipedia page for "suicide in Japan" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2877" data-id="2877" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2877</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/fexii" class="UserMention">@fexii</a></li>
<li>Image search not respecting minus / negative operator <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2884" data-id="2884" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2884</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Tiny_Beetle" class="UserMention">@Tiny_Beetle</a></li>
<li>Bangs have become case sensitive <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2946" data-id="2946" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2946</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li>
<li>Lens descriptions in settings are all truncated <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2916" data-id="2916" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2916</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/ValPolyakh" class="UserMention">@ValPolyakh</a></li>
<li>Issues with iOS keyboard cursor swipe gesture <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1759" data-id="1759" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1759</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/TyPell91" class="UserMention">@TyPell91</a> </li>
<li>Weather Widget Location Issue. <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2852" data-id="2852" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2852</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/cempack" class="UserMention">@cempack</a></li>
<li>News and Web Search Returns Out of Date Results vs. Google <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2764" data-id="2764" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2764</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/CrunchyFritos" class="UserMention">@CrunchyFritos</a></li>
<li>Add a feedback button to the mobile menu <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/1616" data-id="1616" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#1616</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/thislooksfun" class="UserMention">@thislooksfun</a></li>
<li>Redirect rule does not seem to be applied to "Interesting Finds" <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2967" data-id="2967" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2967</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/frereit" class="UserMention">@frereit</a></li>
<li>Some links in the wikipedia article preview do not work <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2977" data-id="2977" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2977</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/tdf" class="UserMention">@tdf</a></li>
<li>"Show more" button when there's nothing more to show <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2980" data-id="2980" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2980</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/eikowagenknecht" class="UserMention">@eikowagenknecht</a></li></ul>


<h3>Assistant</h3>


<ul><li>We've added Mistral Medium to our Assistant, available to Ultimate subscribers<br>
<img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-24/1706106465-144740-image.png" title="" alt=""></li></ul>


<ul><li>Research Assistant now respects your preferences for domain rankings when gathering information. It recognizes the websites you've pinned, promoted, demoted, or blocked, ensuring tailored search results. Inspired by <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2533" data-id="2533" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2533</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Zambyte" class="UserMention">@Zambyte</a></li>
<li>When invoking chat in assistant wrong model is selected <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2909" data-id="2909" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2909</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a></li>
<li>Assistant Chat GPT4 truncates Input on Mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2882" data-id="2882" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2882</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jhkmnl" class="UserMention">@jhkmnl</a></li>
<li>FastGPT should autofocus on the prompt field on load <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2676" data-id="2676" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2676</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mhitza" class="UserMention">@mhitza</a> </li>
<li>Support for research assistant math results with latex <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2925" data-id="2925" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2925</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Mg432" class="UserMention">@Mg432</a></li>
<li>Code examples show "$_latex_inline" in place of any $ character <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2966" data-id="2966" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2966</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/mhersh" class="UserMention">@mhersh</a></li></ul>

</content>

entries.description:
Announcements

Today, we’re happy and proud to have reached 20,000 members.

We have a special surprise for our community. Read everything about it in our blog post.

Features

  • Kagi search extension for Chrome and Firefox 0.5.0 released
    • Added support for FastGPT
    • Fix: Kagi Extension API Key Not Persistent in Firefox ESR on Kali Linux #2234 @Maxpl01Z
    • Fix: Kagi keeps saying invalid session token in firefox on linux after setting up successfully and working fine for a while. #2090 @bkw777a
    • Fix: Firefox default search engine keeps resetting #2748 @Tulip

  • We've introduced an option to disable all personalizations (like blocked or raised domains) for your current search. Just click on "Options" — found at the top of the search results — and deselect "Personalized". Suggested by #1943 @stoyle
  • New, automated status page following the learnings from the post-mortem last week

Improvements & Bug fixes

  • Accessibility improvements #2923 @darekkay
  • Perform a reverse image search with Kagi by pasting any image directly from your clipboard into the search bar. Suggested by #1704 @VIEWVIEWVIEW
  • Search yields no results #2953 @flat_reward
  • "Time in Japan" shows the Wikipedia page for "suicide in Japan"
entries.title: Jan 24, 2024 - Celebrating 20k members

entries.author: Vlad

content.value:
<content xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" type="html"><h2>Announcements</h2>

 <ul><li>We added "<strong>Quick Peek</strong>" widget to our results. With this addition you will find additional relevant results about the query you are searching. This feature can be easily enabled / disabled in the <a href="https://kagi.com/settings?p=search" rel="ugc nofollow">Search Settings</a>.</li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-16/1705427357-987277-screenshot-2024-01-16-at-094910.png" title="" alt=""></p>

  <br>
 <ul><li>We added <strong>additional sources for local businesses</strong> to our inline maps search results. Inline maps should be more responsive now when searching for specific local businesses. More improvements to come. Related issue: Local business / open hours <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2477" data-id="2477" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2477</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/partlycloudy" class="UserMention">@partlycloudy</a></li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-16/1705427049-489431-screenshot-2024-01-16-at-094320.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<ul><li>Find hidden treasures from the early days of the web through the new <strong>Usenet / Archive search lens</strong></li> </ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-16/1705428002-248272-screenshot-2024-01-16-at-095955.png" title="" alt=""></p>

 <ul><li><p>Kagi Assistant (available as open beta for Ultimate members) now leverages <strong>GPT4-vision model</strong> to better understand and describe images. You can test this improved functionality by uploading images or providing image URLs for the Kagi Assistant to analyse.</p>

 <p>Edit: A member just emailed saying "the example you have is wrong about 7 of the 10 "Key Points" (only the restaurant name, VAT amount, and amount tendered are correct)." Yes that can be the case with LLMs, we are not trying to present this as grounbreaking, we just integrated a model and the example is as good as the underlying model. This is clearly demonstrating its limitations and it is what it is. We are currently using the best commercially available vision model on the market and it is our desire to emphasize that access to this and other world's cutting edge LLM's are all included in the Assistant with one Kagi subscription. No doubt they will get better in the future.</p></li></ul>

<p><img src="https://kagifeedback.org/assets/files/2024-01-16/1705427862-716303-screenshot-2024-01-16-at-095718.png" title="" alt=""></p>

<h3>Outage post-mortem</h3>

 <ul><li>We've dissected last Thursday's events and the steps we're taking in response in a detailed <a href="https://status.kagi.com/issues/2024-01-12-kagi-down-on-some-regions/" rel="ugc nofollow">post-mortem report</a>. Thank you for bearing with us, and please look forward to a more robust service as we continue to improve.</li></ul>

<h2>Improvements &amp; Bug fixes</h2>

<ul><li>Some summarized results display wrong language <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2907" data-id="2907" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2907</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Dustin" class="UserMention">@Dustin</a> </li>
<li>Clear search button doesn’t work (Mobile Orion) <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2870" data-id="2870" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2870</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jeffdaley" class="UserMention">@jeffdaley</a></li>
<li>Long filename text overflows in Assistant <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2631" data-id="2631" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2631</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/sw" class="UserMention">@sw</a></li>
<li>Research Assistant incorrectly citing sources as "Item X"  <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2908" data-id="2908" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2908</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Buffalo_Tree" class="UserMention">@Buffalo_Tree</a></li>
<li>Assistant responses rendering real HTML elements <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2650" data-id="2650" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2650</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/httpjames" class="UserMention">@httpjames</a></li>
<li>Fail to apply redirection rule to widget (e.g. wikipedia widget) in search result <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2801" data-id="2801" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2801</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Fernandez" class="UserMention">@Fernandez</a></li>
<li>Lens excluded words not working <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2643" data-id="2643" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2643</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Recast" class="UserMention">@Recast</a> </li>
<li>Setting theme-color meta attribute doesn't work <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2868" data-id="2868" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2868</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Holger" class="UserMention">@Holger</a></li>
<li>Short terms &amp; quick answers add horizontal scrolling on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2865" data-id="2865" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2865</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Vapid" class="UserMention">@Vapid</a></li>
<li>Rendring markdown code snippets etc, is wrong in lists <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2724" data-id="2724" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2724</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a></li>
<li>Sending two different questions to FastGPT causes responses to glitch <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2480" data-id="2480" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2480</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/DeltAndy" class="UserMention">@DeltAndy</a></li>
<li>Transparent image filters not working <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2402" data-id="2402" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2402</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/jesus" class="UserMention">@jesus</a></li>
<li>Kagi search personalised results bug <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2867" data-id="2867" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2867</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Repacking6528" class="UserMention">@Repacking6528</a></li>
<li>Country Codes should work when searching in Country Menu <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/998" data-id="998" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#998</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Imperator_of_all" class="UserMention">@Imperator_of_all</a></li>
<li>Shield icon and popup panel metric are unclear how they relate <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2668" data-id="2668" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2668</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/laserdinosaur" class="UserMention">@laserdinosaur</a></li>
<li>[Discuss Document] SyntaxError: Unexpected token <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2843" data-id="2843" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2843</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/RMcCurdyDOTcom" class="UserMention">@RMcCurdyDOTcom</a></li>
<li>Universal Summarizer Hallucination <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2652" data-id="2652" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2652</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/CrunchyFritos" class="UserMention">@CrunchyFritos</a></li>
<li>Universal summarizer doesn't show in Korean <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2891" data-id="2891" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2891</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/HanbyulKimLuke" class="UserMention">@HanbyulKimLuke</a></li>
<li>Quick answer messes up viewport on mobile <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2924" data-id="2924" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2924</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/stoyle" class="UserMention">@stoyle</a></li>
<li>Lowering the ranking of gov.cn doesn't work <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2681" data-id="2681" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2681</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/Peter" class="UserMention">@Peter</a></li>
<li>Images from text results show missing image for a few seconds after clicking <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2844" data-id="2844" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2844</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/olly_kf" class="UserMention">@olly_kf</a></li>
<li>Metacritic bang command (!mc) gives a 404, new URL needed <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/d/2920" data-id="2920" class="DiscussionMention"><span class="DiscussionMention-text">#2920</span></a> <a href="https://kagifeedback.org/u/pdm" class="UserMention">@pdm</a></li></ul></content>
